summary: Hold the fort and achieve Global Domination!Maps included: Himeji Castle Red Sands Fort Conwy Castle Mont Saint Michel

name: Rift Rangers
summary: Rift Rangers is a sentai themed casual rogue-lite where you defend against an endless horde of dimensional creatures. Construct and upgrade your defensive turrets while dodging enemies! Find the right combination of turrets and upgrades to become an impenetrable fortress!

name: RideOp: New Heights - Expansion pack
summary: Expand your park with two new extreme rides for you to operate. Air Race and Insanity. Not afraid of heights, are you?

name: Ride 2: Rising Sun Bikes Pack
summary: From the Far East come 6 bikes that everyone will want in their garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 9
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 9 DLC and add two new models to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 8
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 8 DLC and add two new models to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 7
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 7 DLC and add two new models to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 6
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 6 DLC and add two models to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 5
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 5 DLC and add two new models to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 4
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 4 DLC and add two new models to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 3
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 3 DLC and add the Aprilia RSV4 RR 2015 and the Mr Martini Ducati Flashback California to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Free Bikes Pack 2
summary: Download the Free Bikes Pack 2 DLC and you can add the Suzuki RMZ 450 2015 and the MV Agusta F4 1000 Tamburini to your garage!

name: Ride 2: Exotic Bikes Pack
summary: Six special bikes, developed with a style that is unique to their kind!

name: Ride 2: 2017 Top Bikes Pack
summary: Everything new for 2017, presented at the most hotly-awaited motorbike trade fairs of the year!

name: Ride 2: Aprilia and Suzuki Bonus Pack
summary: Buy the Aprilia and Suzuki Bonus Pack DLC and you will obtain the Suzuki Hayabusa 2015, the Aprilia Tuono V4 Factory 2015 and 10 helmets!

name: Ride 2: Collector Bikes Pack
summary: The best modern versions of old-fashioned classics!

name: Ride 2: Competition Bikes Pack
summary: A collection of the best sports bikes in a single DLC!

name: Ride 2: Ducati Bikes Pack
summary: A tribute to the history of Ducati! 6 models, from nakeds to sports, for a wholly Italian DLC!

name: Rin ga Utau, Mirai no Neiro
summary: “Rin ga Utau, Mirai no Neiro” which means “Rin’s Song, The Colorful Sound of Future” or “The Bells Sing The Future’s Timbre” is the sequel of “Mirai no Kimi to, Subete no Uta ni”.

name: Risk of Rain Returns
summary:
Carefully designed, beautifully remastered, and loaded with new ways to play—Risk of Rain is back and better than ever! This remake of the classic Risk of Rain packs enhanced visuals, an updated codebase, and tons of new content.

No two runs in the iconic roguelike are the same, and that has never been truer. Risk of Rain Returns bring new and enhanced Survivors, customizable Survivor abilities, fresh items, monsters, and a brand-new game mode. The game’s difficulty increases the longer you play, so prepare to fight through hordes of enemies that threaten your continued existence, collect and combine items to enhance your abilities, and scale your power to godlike levels.

Many Survivors fled the mysterious attack on your ship. Forge new paths to explore with 15 unique Survivors, each with new abilities to master. Two entirely new Survivors are making their debut in Risk of Rain Returns.

name: Rights of Progression
summary:
You are the Arbiter.

As planets apply to join your alliance of planets, it is up to you to approve or deny each request. It is your judgement, and their future lies in your hands.

name: Richard Burns Rally
summary: Gizmondo port of Richard Burns Rally.

name: Risk your life to get your dinner back Nyanzou action game
summary:
Maximum speed is infinite
Jump action full of sprinting

name: Ringborn
summary: You are Idas, a woodcutter's son thrust into a medieval world of power and impotence, of beauty and corruption. Enter the world of Ringborn and immerse yourself in a captivating story realised through deep combat, beautiful graphics and impactful player choice.

name: Rings of Saturn: Deep Weeb
summary: Transforms all crew portraits into beloved anime characters, adding a new level of personality and immersion to your space adventure.

name: Ripple Dot Zero
summary: Ripple Dot Zero is an 2D platformer in stylized after other 16 bit games of the 90s, most notably Sonic the Hedgehog and the games it inspired. In it you play as a penguin that just broke free out of a tank tube with the mission to beat the levels and free other penguins in this dystopic future. It was released online by Pixeltruss as a free browser game.

name: Ridiculous RPG
summary:
Ridiculous RPG - Boy - Hurry to School is a 8-bit RPG game. You are 'Boy', a 15 years old student who is hurrying to school to take the exam. On the way to school, you aware that the 'Dark Power' is awakening, the power that can destroy the world!
On the other hand, another character called 'Kid' is going to investigate the boss behind the power. During the investigation, Kid's real memory is gradually awakening. Kid is not a normal kid. He has a dangerous power that is much dangerous than the Dark Power, the power that can destroy the whole galaxy!!!
You'll encounter different monsters in different dungeons. Fight the monsters with cards. Choose a 'Sword' card if you're going to attack the monster. Choose a 'Shield' card if you're going to protect yourself. There are also 16 'Special Cards' during the battle. e.g. Poisons the enemy
You'll get coins and knowledge points in the game. Use coins to upgrade weapons. Use knowledge points to study hard in academic subjects to increase your own strength. Defeat the monsters to gain experience.

name: Rift Breach
summary: A sci-fi dungeon crawler where you choose the next room. Your options are rarely beneficial, with random traps, puzzles and enemies lying in wait. Act quickly, for failure to manage your situation will cause a rapidly-spreading, merciless threat to the entire facility itself - a Rift Breach.

name: Ridge Runner
summary: Ridge Runner is a game of reaction and skill as you try to escape the castle. Collect stars to unlock different characters including a knight on horseback, a fireman or even a selfie-obsessed teenage girl. Game features high quality 2D visuals, retro inspired custom soundtrack and a variety of fun characters to unlock.

name: RICE: Repetitive Indie Combat Experience
summary: A rich paragraph of information which will try to charm and pique interest, trying to catch your eye in a sea of competition using a slew of buzzwords such as ‘bullet heaven’ and ‘in-depth meta-progression’, in a vain attempt to make you believe this game is any different from others in it’s genre.

name: Ridge Racer 2
summary: A port of Ridge Racer 2, originally released on the PSP, enhanced for PS4/PS5 with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Riboud and Fairies
summary: Riboud and Fairies is an excellent horizontal board game for beautiful girls, similar to Super Mario. It has extremely exquisite dynamic beauty CG. You can use your fighting skills to clear the bound objects on the beauty! Its level design is also very creative, and the dialogue is also very funny.

name: Ricochet Kills 2
summary: Kill all your enemies with your gun by making a perfect angle and by taking a right shot.

name: Ricky's Rockin' Arcade
summary: Ricky’s Raccoon’s Rockin’ Arcade allows in person hangouts to gain a digital dimension giving you a virtual arcade to hang out in, and turn an ordinary game night into something unforgettable!

name: Righteous Mojo
summary: Righteous Mojo follows the Rockstar Selene as she loses a Rock Battle with a demon that steals her talent. With the help of the Rock Fairy himself, she travels through the demon's home world to get her talent back.

name: Rise and Fall: Bronze Age
summary: Rise & Fall: Bronze Age is a Grand Strategy game set in the Bronze Age between 3400BC and 1150BC. Expand your power by diplomacy and war and manage your troublesome elites. Feed your people, build temples for your gods and tombs for your rulers. How high can you rise before your empire fall ?

name: Rina to Akumu no Kan
summary: One day, the unlucky girl "Runa Ichiya" wakes up in a haunted house.

name: Rising City
summary: "Rising City" is a city building game where you build your own city with hexagons on the endless sea. By meeting people's needs, you can ensure their happiness and attract more people to your city.

name: RivenWorld: The First Era
summary: Can you survive the unforgiving medieval world? Welcome to RivenWorld, an open-world, sandbox, survival multiplayer game based in the medieval era.

name: Ristar
summary: 8-bit port of Ristar on the Sega Game Gear with remixed levels and a few original stages.

name: Ria
summary: In this open world adventure, you'll be exploring and solving as you uncover the story of Ria, the magical capybara looking to stop the Dark soul from taking over. With your inner power along the way, and experience a journey driven by your choices to save the world.

name: Risen 3: Fog Island
summary: A stranded Inquisition raiding party is searching for new territory in a world where madness seems to spread. Help them unveil the deadly secret found on this island.

name: Right and Down and Dice
summary: Explore randomly generated card dungeons where you can only move Right and Down, use Dice to defeat mighty enemies, gather powerful artifacts and learn new abilites! Will you be able to escape from the dungeon?

name: Rider of Justice
summary: A top-down shooter where you run and gun down bad guys as the vigilante, Rider. Vastly outnumbered, quickly kill and quickly die as you sweep through multifloored buildings bringing criminals to justice.

name: Ripples
summary: Ripples is a story-focused sci-fi adult visual novel that centers around an 18-year-old in his last year of high school as he tries to balance his romantic life with his secret one.

name: Ricochet Gun
summary: Use your gun to destroy enemies, but make sure to aim properly or things might get out of control.

name: Riley in the Abyss
summary: Riley In The Abyss is a stealth action shooter. You wake up as 'Riley'in an underwater facility to research the depths of the ocean. Upon waking up, something is wrong... Everyone is seemingly dead. Sink or swim in this short psychological horror game.

name: Riding Horse School
summary: It's time to make new friends!

name: R.I.P
summary: Kevin is a police officer who is looking for a very dangerous killer. After receiving an anonymous call, he decides to check out the place.

name: Rider Among Dead
summary: Rider Among Dead - Mad Zombie Killer Machine Survival is the number one action game that blends the mechanics of off-road racing and survival games. The world has been consumed by a zombie outbreak, leaving you to survive in the wasteland.

name: Riri & Coco
summary:
Riri & Coco are prisoners of the drawing book !
To get out of the book you have to solve the puzzle by collaborating as fast as possible.

name: Ringlorn Saga Gaiden
summary: Ringlorn Saga Gaiden is an adventure RPG inspired by the Japanese PC classics. After dying in a decisive battle, your spirit is separated from your body, and you must exact your revenge on the Dark Lord by possessing his minions.

name: Rise of the Funkys
summary: A side scrolling beat 'em up game where you control 4 characters with unique combat mechanics. Make your way through 6 stages of this crime-ridden world, where random events happen to spice up the combat experience.

name: RingoWord
summary: Playing is easy: Quickly figure out where the word starts within the circle. Sounds simple, but trying to spot the right word is a real challenge. Compete against the clock and your online opponents. Can you reach the top and become #1 in the World? Get ready for a real brain training!

name: Ribbit
summary: Ribbit! (リビット!) is an arcade game developed and published by Sega for Sega System C hardware. It's similar in nature to Frogger, in that the user controls a frog, capable of moving in four directions. Your task is to eat all the small bugs while avoiding bigger ones.

name: Rival Stars College Football
summary: As the head coach of a college football program, you make the calls. Recruit fresh talent, build an unbeatable playbook, and make risky plays for big payoffs. Join forces with players from around the world to form alliances and take on rivals. With big dreams and even bigger challenges, the team will rely on your leadership to take them to the top. Will they make it to the Hall of Legends?

name: Rise to Surface
summary:
Avoid the rocks and pick up the treasures.
Help the little monster in the bubble to rise up to the surface in this action packed game.

name: Ride Control Ultimate
summary: Ride-Control Ultimate is a simulation-oriented game in which you play as a showman. You start your activity with a small attraction that will allow you to learn how to assemble/disassemble it, animate your turns, customize it and then unlock other increasingly impressive and popular ones among the 16 included in the game!

name: Rise of Gun
summary: Rise of Gun - immerses you in a world of zombie apocalypse as a gun store owner. Buy parts, craft, sell, upgrade your store and hire workers. Help to humanity survive

name: Rise of the High Elf King: A Legacy of Blood
summary: Take on the role of our protagonist in his epic rise to power to become High Elf King in this 2D side scroller set in a world of magic and fantasy.

name: Riddles And Sieges
summary: Riddles & Sieges is a medieval puzzle game where you use old siege weapons to solve puzzles. Your goal is to destroy the castle and for that you are given sets of different buildings with their own quirks and timings.

name: Ringash
summary: Ringash is a challenging, fast-paced action game. You can use various weapons and skills to create your own unique combat style to conquer any difficulties. As a warrior with mystical powers, You'll try to save a world that is being destroyed by the abyss, and uncover the truth behind the disaster.

name: Riftstorm
summary: Storms are coming, and there are rules you must follow. RIFTSTORM is co-op looter-shooter set in a world of myth and secret societies where you can play solo or co-op in a party of three.

name: Ritual
summary: Ritual is a first-person psychological horror game. Immerse yourself in this sinister experience of terror, where everything familiar becomes strange to you, find the necessary elements to complete the ritual and solve the mystery.

name: Rizline
summary:
Presenting Pigeon Games' second enchanting music rhythm game, following the success of "Phigros"!
Dive into a mesmerizing journey where points and lines dance in harmony, weaving an extraordinary geometric tapestry set to the innermost beat of your heart!

name: River Song
summary: A Kaizo light hack for beginners! The tricks and set ups start very easy but tend to get a bit more difficult further on.

name: Ride 5
summary: Rev up your engine and get ready to hit the track with RIDE 5. An adrenaline-filled gaming experience that is so authentic it will make you feel like you're truly racing at break-neck speed. Find your favorite bikes and check out new ones in the ultimate motorcycle game! Race on over 35 tracks and collect more than 200 motorcycles from world-renowned manufacturers, each element is designed to feel like you're riding a real bike.

name: Rivals of Aether II
summary: Rivals of Aether II is the sequel to the hit indie fighting game, Rivals of Aether. Play as both new and returning elemental fighters in the next generation of platform fighters.

name: Riddle of the Jelly
summary: The adventure… the glory… the mystery… Can you solve the Riddle of the Jelly?

name: Ride 5: Special Edition
summary: Enjoy RIDE to the fullest with RIDE 5 - Special Edition! In addition to the full game you'll also get the Season Pass that will give you access to bikes, amazing tracks and a credit multiplier as soon as they become available.

name: Rigged Hammer
summary: Clone of Wrecking Crew '98; also called Build Man.

name: RimWorld: Console Edition - Chronicles Bundle
summary:
The Chronicles Bundle includes:
- RimWorld: Console Edition
- RimWorld: Console Edition - Royalty DLC
- RimWorld: Console Edition - Ideology DLC

name: Rich Dad Simulator
summary: Run your own chain of markets. Start from a small shop to the biggest business in town. Manage staff, control inventory, set prices, and keep customers happy. Build new locations and expand your retail empire. Can you succeed and become the king of retail?

name: Rise of Jericho
summary: Lead hunter-gatherers and give rise to human civilization in Jericho, the oldest city in the world. Gather resources, craft tools and build structures to protect villagers and make your city thrive.

name: Rise Again
summary: An action RPG where a wizard hack and slash enemies, transforming into a roguelike dungeon crawler.

name: Risk: Global Domination - Universal Domination Map Pack
summary: Taking global domination into a battle for universal conquest in these 4 new space maps.

name: Rival Stars Basketball
summary:
Rival Stars Basketball gives you the control. Draft extraordinary players, plan your strategy and unleash your team on real opponents from around the world in thrilling card battles. Make heat of the moment plays to gain the lead as tension builds. Then at pivotal moments get thrown into 3D on court action! Do you pass or do you go for the 3 pointer? Your choice can make or break your success.
There are tons of ways to win powerful rare players and a world of ever-evolving rivals to pit them against. Shoot for Stardom, with Rival Stars Basketball!

name: Rite as Rain
summary: Open world rpg puzzle game with turn based combat

name: Ritual Bound
summary: Deep in the forest, the witches watch over a prison, keeping an Old Horror sealed. Tonight, the seals binding it must be renewed... But there's a problem.

name: Ridiculous Triathlon
summary:
Run, swim and drive in ridiculous ways in this is amazing runner!
Ridiculous Triathlon is the story of 3 characters that put their forces together to be able to compete in a triathlon!
They form a perfect trio but on their own they would not have any chance to win the competition!
They need you to help them dodge all the obstacles and pass the different stages of the game!
In this original, innovative and ridiculous endless runner game visit different cities of the world such as Barcelona, London & Tokyo!
Travel these emblematic cities in the three triathlon stages that include running, cycling and swimming!
Each of the different triathlon stages have their own funny and simple dynamics and controls!

name: Rise From the Ashes: A Fantasy World Simulator
summary: A strategic city-building game set in a fantasy universe that allows you to create your own fantastical civilization. Define your architectural style using a building editor, customize your people, manage your city, and restore the past glory of your civilization!

name: Ride or Die!
summary: Jump on & joyride any car on the road, dodge heavy traffic, and outrun the cops in high-speed chases to steal cars. Collect all the cars in your garage, upgrade them for bonus abilities, and make mad money. Get ready to Ride or Die!

name: Rising Snake: The Present World
summary: Rising Snake: The Present World is a semi sandbox horror decryption adventure game. A fictional university campus based on real size. A "Taoist" with special abilities. A twisted and bizarre story. Waiting for your arrival.

name: Ridiculous Rush
summary: Ridiculous Rush - 2D platformer game with a big variety of levels. You control a character trying to find the way to a portal to the next level avoiding multiple obstacles. Each level has increasing level of difficulty. Some levels have multiple ways of completing. Try your best and find them all!

name: Riverflow
summary: Let the river flow, and nourish the land.

name: RichMan 4 Fun
summary: In the world of property, rely on your luck and decision-making becoming a tycoon!

name: Richard Benson
summary: A game about Richard Benson.

name: Rice Bowl Restaurant
summary: Challenge yourself to serve the best Mixed Indonesian Rice dish and make your customers happy

name: Rift Loopers: Pyro Class
summary: Get access to the Pyro class and their arsenal

name: Riversiders
summary: Raft down the river, camp in the wild, and make friends!

name: RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone
summary: In RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone - Embark on a slapstick-filled adventure where mishaps are the norm. Keep your wits about you, dodge calamity, and quickly complete tasks without getting injured!

name: Rise and Grind!
summary: We call you to survive in a world that only wakes you up once a year. Wake up, collect, build, expand, be prepared for dangers, and sleep for one year! Each awakening brings a new adventure, an opportunity to become stronger!

name: Rise for the Fight
summary: A Cartoon Multiplayer FPS Game, where you can upgrade your guns by dealing damage or gaining multikills.

name: Riddle for your Life
summary: Do you have what it takes to solve all riddles? Your life may depend on it. The stakes are high. Winning grants you a powerful reward, losing means certain death. Are you brave enough to play the odds?

name: Ripple in Dirac Sea
summary: PvPvE moba-like game: 2 teams (1 god and 6 heroes per team) fight each other in a 2km*2km map with random starting points, random shops, and random monster bosses. 80% Action - heroes , 20% RTS - god .

name: Rionag: Survey Fleet
summary: Rionag: Survey Fleet is a top-down starship builder and logistics game where it's your job to balance the needs of the crews with cutting-edge equipment on board. Unlock tech that adds new capabilities for your ships to go through hazardous environments, enabling you to explore new worlds.

name: Rich Maser: Cash King
summary: Rich Master is a casual mobile game that combines the excitement of collecting and trading with the thrill of building and developing your own village. The goal is to collect as many coins as possible and use them to upgrade your village, build new structures, and compete against other players in game challenges.

name: Rise of Queendom
summary: Royal Life Simulation Game.

name: Ricky's Furry Duck Hunt
summary: Join Ricky as he hunts some ...peculiar... looking ducks in this arcade-style point-and-click game.

name: Risen Dead
summary:
Risen Dead is an Eerie Zombie PSX Styled Action Survival Singleplayer game where a nuclear winter occurred, causing the dead to awake.

You are a survivor.

name: Rifter
summary: A unique platformer puzzle where you have to duplicate yourself to solve the puzzles and progress without your other self catching up with you!

name: River City: Rival Showdown
summary:
River City Ransom is back, rebuilt from the ground up! Rekindle old rivalries and relive past rumbles through a completely revamped story!

A re-release of the classic Nintendo 3DS sandbox brawler, this version of the game has been updated with tweaked controls, graphical upgrades, and a new online mode in the form of Double Dragon Duel 2023.

name: Rise of Block
summary: Rise of Block is an endless game where you avoid obstacles trying to beat your high score.

name: Ridiculous Fishing EX
summary:
An updated, handcrafted game about fishing with guns, chainsaws & toasters.
Follow Billy as he tries to find redemption from his uncertain past. Chase your destiny on the high seas and embark on a heroic quest for gills and glory.
An all-new 3D Ridiculous Fishing built from the ground up by the original award-winning team, with new features:

name: Ripples
summary: A short story about cats, cookies, and making a difference. Koda is a photographer who dislikes people. But a chance encounter with Kuu may get him thinking otherwise... and it all started with cookies. This is a short voiced kinetic novel made as a family gift.

name: Rider Worlds
summary:
Feast your eyes with brand new 3D graphics, and unleash your riding skills throughout the unique Worlds of Rider Worlds. Each of them provides a unique riding experience, and offers lots of content to unlock!
Grab one of the 18 unique vehicles and start flipping through 150 killer challenges!
Pimp your favorite bike with 144 custom looks and finishes to make it one of a kind!

name: Rift Walker
summary: A medieval turn-based action game with time traveling elements! Travel with your party across the realms and slay many demons, creatures, and other enemies trying to stop you from defeating the Dark Lord!

name: Rider Worlds
summary:
Welcome to the long-awaited sequel to the legendary Rider game (150 millions downloads worldwide)!

Feast your eyes with brand new 3D graphics, and unleash your riding skills throughout the unique Worlds of Rider Worlds. Each of them provides a unique riding experience, and offers lots of content to unlock!

Grab one of the 18 unique vehicles and start flipping through 150 killer challenges!

name: Rising Sun Mahjong
summary: Mahjong on the background of the rising sun! Soft and delicate morning colors, the city and the countryside in a bluish haze, glistening dew drops on the leaves of trees..... All this and fascinating levels-puzzles in the mahjong genre are waiting for you in this game!

name: Rise of Koreth
summary: Uncover the mysteries of Koreth's resting place in this exciting hack n slash, dungeon crawler, platformer adventure.

name: Rivencrest
summary: Unleash strategic mastery in a captivating team-based adventure, as you assemble and customize diverse squads to conquer challenging levels, vanquish formidable foes and unravel the mysteries of the village.

name: Rival Party
summary: Rival Party is a multiplayer fast-paced party game packed with unique and challenging mini-games that will give you endless hours of fun and excitement!

name: Ring Racer
summary: Navigate through rings in stunning canyons and race against the clock.

name: Risker
summary: Risker is an unlicensed clone of Mario Bros. that is bundled in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: Risk Ranch
summary: Welcome to the first and most exciting agriculture-based learning app for kids of all ages! Risk Ranch is a fun, free and fast-paced, single-player education game with engaging, real-life content, challenging you to learn about the economics of agriculture while bringing your steer to market. Avoid risks, allocate your coins wisely and purchase Futures to protect your investment… It’s up to you to safely raise your steer and make a profit on your farm! As you progress throughout the game, you’ll have a chance to play through all four seasons while learning about the real-time risks that affect the value of your steer.

name: Rixer
summary: Rixer is a fast paced 6 degrees of freedom space combat sim. Battle it out in different PvP game modes with bot support and compete in high speed races. Experiment with extensive live-multiplayer stat modding and map editor.

name: Ring Stars
summary: Ring Stars is a physics-based 3D fighting game with local multiplayer for up to 4 players.

name: Rich Teddy Adventure
summary: Get ready for an epic adventure in a magical world filled with wonder and danger. You play as a Teddy Bear who has been summoned to this realm to save it from an impending doom. To do so, you must travel through a series of portals that lead to different parts of this mystical world.

name: Risky Sanctuary
summary: Create, customize, and manage a vibrant sex club filled with adorable anthropomorphic characters. Watch the party unfold, while you install adult devices, navigate finances, protect your reputation, and manage a team of dedicated employees.

name: Risk of Rain: Starstorm
summary: Starstorm is currently the biggest content mod for Risk of Rain (ModLoader) featuring new survivors, items, enemies, stages, artifacts and bosses. Starstorm focuses on expanding the content of Risk of Rain by adding a whole new layer of diversity to improve gameplay and breathe new life into the game.

name: Rival Gears Racing
summary:
Race Head to Head in this unique high speed action racer. Compete alone or as part of a team against others in high stakes leagues and events. Bet big to win big.
Do you have what it takes to beat the best?

Challenge real players in exciting adrenaline fuelled races through busy city streets. Set wagers, race for glory and riches, and become a real high roller.

Choose from a wide range of stunning rides, each with their own classic lines blended with sleek future styling. These are cars like no other.

 Join or create a Pro-Team and play with old friends and make new ones. Get exclusive benefits, help your friends, and work together to become the top team in the world.

name: Ride 4: Bonus Pack 12
summary: Download the Bonus Pack 12 and expand your gaming experience with 1 new exclusive bike and 5 events.

name: Ringleaders
summary: Trust no one in this retrofuturistic, prohibition-inspired social deduction shooter.

name: Rise of the Overseer
summary: Rise of the Overseer introduces the morally and ethically bankrupt AI controller, The Overseer, whose natural attitude to game Participants is occasional threats of vaporisation. This sokoban/multiban adventure puzzle game is set in science fiction world of the Overseer Corporation Gaming Centre.

name: Rinne
summary: A simple yet challenging action game that can be played with just one button! Control the "Fool", a cursed soul cast into hell with the ability to only change direction, and collect golden souls to reach the goal! If you hit a wall, you die! If you hit a red laser, you die! If you hit a chasing needle, you die!

name: Rising Blood
summary: This is a remake of one of Chris Hansen's really early levels. He always considered it as his first really good level and felt that it needed a revival.

name: Riskant!
summary:
Based on the hit television show, "Riskant!" (which itself is based on "Jeopardy!") for Commodore 64 and Amiga features support for three players. Before starting, you can enter the number of participants, their names, gender and appearance.

Gameplay consists of selecting a category and money value with number keys. After the "answer" appears, you have 7 seconds to buzz in. Answering involves selecting the start of the question ("Who is/was ...", "What is/was ..." etc.) and completing the question with the right answer in 30 seconds.

After the first two rounds, players with positive dollar amounts can play in Riskant! Finale. The player with the most money at the end of this round wins the game.

name: Riders Republic: 360 Edition
summary: With the Riders Republic 360 Edition, take your experience to the next level. Enjoy the skate and hoverboard for a unique freeriding experience across the Republic's vibrant open world. Build your legend with original sports (bike,* ski, snowboard, and wingsuit).

name: Riders Republic: Complete Edition
summary: With the Riders Republic Complete Edition, face no restrictions and shred like there is no tomorrow! Enjoy the skateboard, BMX, and hoverboard for a unique urban riding experience through the Republic's vibrant open world. Build your legend with original sports (racing bike, mountain bike, ski, snowboard, and wingsuit).

name: Riders Republic: Skate Edition
summary: Shred the Ridge like never before with Riders Republic Skate Edition. Hop on your board and ride across brand-new skate parks! The Skate Edition includes the base game and the Skate add-on.

name: River City Girls 1, 2, and Zero Bundle
summary: Clean up the mean streets of River City across three hard-hitting, knuckle-busting beat-'em-ups: River City Girls, River City Girls 2, and River City Girls Zero!

name: River Pirates
summary:
Easy to play Tower Defense game with a pirates setting.

River Pirates has an invading horde of pirates sailing up river to attack your stronghold. You defend your keep by placing a variety of defenses along the river's banks to prevent the pirates from navigating the river from one side of the screen to the other.

name: Rising Dead
summary: Survive a zombie-infested mall for 3 days. Fight, scavenge, rescue, and customize your character in this dynamic game.

name: Ritual: Path of Darkness
summary: Ritual is a tower defense that deals with a sorcerer who must draw runes to invoke a goddess of death. During the summoning, villagers and believers will try to overthrow you. To achieve your goal, you must acquire improvements that enhance your rituals, or the defense of your fortress.

name: Rise of a Hero
summary: Clear the areas captured by terrorists in Syria from terrorists and rescue the hostages.

name: Riot of Willy
summary: Is a horror game with an adventure twist. Your task is to solve puzzles and not to get caught by monsters. They all hear and see you, so be careful. Explore the locations and survive in this thrilling horror game

name: Ride 5: King of the Hills Pack
summary: With RIDE 5 - King of the Hills Pack you'll have the ideal bikes available to let loose to the max on Stelvio's hairpins!

name: RiBeat!
summary: RiBeat! is a challenging rhythm game. Hop with the beat of the music while avoiding obstacles and solving puzzles. Play as Muira, the frog deity, and dive into the world of rhythm, puzzles, and catchy music!

name: Rilakkuma: Minna de Goyururi Seikatsu
summary: In Rilakkuma: Minna de Goyururi Seikatsu, players can live free and leisurely lives with lazy bears. Not only can they change the decoration of the room, they can also take photos, and there are mini games to play. Every day in the game will reflect Wii's own time, real-world climate and weather, and seasonal information, allowing players to spend more time with the lazy bear every day. Various mini-games will appear on the bulletin board. Take photos according to the instructions to get props. The content of the problem is difficult to have. As long as you complete 4 questions, you can get a prop to decorate your room.

name: Rinne no Lagrange: Kamogawa Match
summary: Kamogawa is under attack. It's time for Madoka, Ran and Muginami go head back to their cockpits to save the day. Rin-ne no Lagrange - Kamogawa Days links the first anime series with the second. The OVA anime tells the stories of the peaceful times. See Madoka and her friends' daily lives. The charming episode is a chance to meet the characters, the existing fans can get closer to the girls and new viewers can get a taste of the style. The game is a loyal playable re-creation of the episodes in the first anime series. Raise your firearms, shoot down the aliens that invade your skies and clear the missions.

name: Riverwood Village
summary:
Still phased after your trek through Korax's homeworld and beyond, rebuilding Cronos has been far from a flawless experience. Much of Korax's minions still wander the world, most unfound by any tasked to slay them.
That is, until one day you get a summons to the town of Riverwood, academic stronghold where all three orders mingle under the root of nature. Korax's minions have regrouped, but under who none can assess.
You arrive at Riverwood to find the town already overrun. This mission is no longer a defense on your part... it's an assault. You swear to the gods that you WILL get to the bottom of this. Readying your strength, you walk through the town gates, which swiftly close behind you....

name: Riders Republic: Skate Plus Pack
summary: With the Riders Republic Skate Plus Pack, it's time for you to show off your skateboarding skills. Take your riding experience up a notch by adding skateboards and a hoverboard to your game.* *Riders Republic is required to play this extension.

name: Riot Control
summary: A set of 4 maps using Quake textures. The maps are small to medium in size, and gameplay gradually gets harder as you progress.

name: Rise
summary: Hero will live with robot girl Nanako for a month with a goal to win MISCON.

name: Rip Van Bubsy
summary: Bubsy ages 10 years every time he falls asleep. Can you solve the mystery of Bubsy? Unofficial fangame made in 7 days and released September 2009.

name: Rich Everyone
summary: The game simulates the life restoration of ancient Chinese farmers in scientific farming, vegetable planting, animal husbandry, and various handicraft workshops. Free simulation construction.

name: Ridevery
summary: In the game you have to become the fastest and most reliable pizza delivery guy, conquering realistic city streets on your high-speed scooter.

name: Rift Wizard 2
summary: Rift Wizard 2 is a tough as nails traditional roguelike wizard simulator. You play as an immortal amnesiac wizard who must journey through the cosmos to defeat his nemesis. Each run, you'll build a unique repertoire of spells, passive skills, and magical artifacts.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 01
summary: Put your skills to the test with the RIDE 5 - Free Pack 01 to get two lightning-fast naked bikes that combine power and excellent handling!

name: Ride 5: Far East Pack
summary: Add 2 Japanese race winners to your garage with RIDE 5 - Far East Pack.

name: Rich Mahogany and Human Leather-Bound Books
summary: Large castle library in the mountains. It uses some Knave textures and comes with a custom skybox.

name: Riverside Town
summary: This map takes place in a riverside town

name: Ride 5: Short Track Pack
summary: Whether on a supermotard or a scooter, push your drifts to the max on the perfect bike with Ride 5: Short Track Pack!

name: Rival Goals
summary: Set real-life daily goals, unlock more characters, and discover the mystery behind the Space Siren who brought you all together. Drink more water, go for a run, do your homework, or anything you need! Make your dreams come true!

name: Risk
summary: An exceedingly short level, Risk takes place around a television recording studio which may or may not be based on a real life location

name: Rift Survivors
summary: Rift Survivors is a top-down action roguelite game. Take on the role of a Rift Guardian and maintain the balance between dimensions while facing deadly enemies. Grow stronger with each playthrough and prove your worth in this unstable multiverse.

name: Risiko Chess
summary: Do you want to play chess? Monopoly? Risk? Or perhaps you want to play a wargame? Here you'll find all of that in one, wild game.

name: Rivers of Blood
summary: Alice suffers an accident and wakes up in a parallel world created by her unconscious in a state of coma. Now she needs to find the strength and means to survive and return to the real world, in this new reality that is completely different and much more terrifying than any nightmare.

name: Rift Saviours
summary: Rift Saviours is a bullet heaven type of game, that enhaces the genre with survival elements. In this game YOU become the bullet hell by crafting your own build in order to survive the never ending hordes of enemies that appear through the different rifts in the world. Will you become the Saviour?

name: Risk of Rain 2: EXXXXXXX-X
summary: An ancient threat awakens on Petrichor V. Master new Survivors, wield new items, and fight your way across uncharted regions. Ascend the levels of the Colossus in a race to confront The False Son. Defeat him and unlock the true power of his Soul!

name: Riders of the Wild
summary: An open-world indoor biking game

name: Risk of Rain 2: Seekers of the Storm
summary: A new storm gathers over Petrichor V and with it comes an ancient threat. Master new survivors and wield new items as you fight your way across uncharted regions of Petrichor V. Ascend the Colossus, defeat The False Son, and unlock the true power of his Soul.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 02
summary: Drift in style with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 02!

name: Rise & Reign
summary: Washed ashore on a strange medieval land, its up to you to choose your destiny. Harvest resources, craft weapons, and build your kingdom. Raid other players or work together. Serve the king or take the throne for yourself. This land is harsh, can you survive?

name: Rivals' Duel
summary: Act fast, duels are fierce. Opponents will not wait a second to defeat you, accelerate your mind and face them with your swords and guns

name: Ride 5: Dreamer's Garage Pack
summary: Collect the bikes everyone wants with Ride 5: Dreamer's Garage Pack and ride the Nevada track's most breathtaking views!

name: Risk of Pain
summary: Risk of Pain is a hardcore puzzle platformer that challenges you to complete many challenging levels. Use parkour, wit and luck to avoid dying! Are you ready to take a risk?!

name: Rivandy
summary:
Rivandy is a online multiplayer game that blends Battle Royale and cooperative Survivor mode. Players clash in a mystical conflict where spirits and souls shape your power.
You control two entities at once:
- A human (with 4 abilities).
- A spirit (with 4 abilities).

name: Risk: Global Domination - Advanced 2 Map Pack
summary: By popular demand it's here. Test out your strategic prowess with these larger and more advanced versions of our most popular maps.

name: Riot
summary: A "gallery-style" arcade shooter similar to Cabal, developed by NMK. Fire at enemies in the background, and in the foreground with two different buttons as you work your way through 6 eclectic levels primed with psychedelic bosses.

name: Rift: Genesis
summary: Stylized Sci-Fi Movement FPS with and influence on melee and shooter based combat and abilities. That takes place across dimensions.

name: Rifted Worlds
summary: A fast-paced Action-RPG that takes place on the floating remnants of destroyed worlds. Discover fragments of your lost world, place them onto the map, then fight and platform your way through the remnants! It's time to uncover the truth behind your world's destruction...

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 03
summary: Add two milestones of motorcycling history to your garage with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 03!

name: Riglas
summary:
The continent of Riglas is inhabited by two races: the Mirians and the Galtians. For years they have fought each other for dominance. Caught in the struggle between the two is the nearly forgotten Osborn race, discriminated and enslaved. Mei, a young Osborn man, leaves his home village in order to free his people, and to discover the forbidden secrets of Beljuna which remain a taboo in this land.

This side-scrolling action role-playing adventure is set in a vast seamless world that consists of interconnected yet varied urban, wilderness, and dungeon-like locations. Players can explore all of Riglas from the outset, a world populated by many different types of friendly and hostile characters. Killing hostiles increases the player's score and eventually makes the main character stronger. Killing friendlies, on the other hand, may lower the score. Combat is simple: approach a character and press the attack button to swing Mei's sword.

name: Ritual of Raven
summary: Ritual of Raven is a cozy farming game that lets you be creative in a witchy world by empowering you to dip your toes into the magic of coding. You will meet lots of quirky characters that you can befriend and trade with. You will be able to enchant magical creatures to help you grow the ingredients for your spells. And of course you can be creative, decorate your farm and explore the magical world around you.

name: Risk
summary: A PC version of the strategic Hasbro board game Risk.

name: Rinne Tsukihime
summary: Rinne Tsukihime is an officially licensed port of Tsukihime for the Game Boy Advance. Released as a windows software, the game was only acessible if you had a CD of the original PC game, having to convert it using the program in order to play it in your handheld.

name: Ripple and Frawg: The Seasonal Song
summary: Play as Ripple and Frawg, who use the power of their magical instruments to puzzle through different environments, journey through different seasons, and travel upriver to return home.

name: Rilakkuma Loop
summary: A puzzle mobile game.

name: Rilakkuma Farm
summary:
A Rilakkuma farming game!

Grow crops and turn them into delicious foods at a variety of stores
Decorate your garden with all kinds of ornaments
Enjoy the good life with Rilakkuma and friends on the farm

name: Rilakkuma Rhythm: Mattari Kibun de Da Run Run Run
summary: A Rilakkuma DS game.

name: Rise of the Ronin: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Japan, 1863. After three centuries of the Tokugawa Shogunate’s oppressive rule, the Black Ships of the West descend upon the nation’s borders and the country falls into a state of turmoil. Amidst the chaos of war, disease and political unrest, a nameless warrior forges their own path, holding the very fate of Japan in their hands.

As a masterless warrior – a Ronin, your destiny is your own. See the story unfold in different ways depending on the choices you make and the characters you ally with along the way. Face critical mission decisions – like whether to assassinate or protect key figures, and shape the course of history through a rich multi-choice system.

name: Rings of Eden
summary: Rings of Eden is an indie open-world RPG inspired by Souls-like games, that blends fantasy, science-fiction, adventure and satisfying combat.

name: Rings of Harmony
summary: Rings Of Harmony est un jeu de puzzle médiéval-fantastique VR dans lequel vous interagissez avec votre environnement pour mener à bien votre quête. Attirez des objets, lancez-les et tracez des lignes pour sauver le monde de la destruction dans un environnement immersif.

name: Ring of The Devil
summary: This is a fighting game.

name: Rim
summary: Rim offers the fanciest way to spend time with your friends online. Talk, chat, and hang out in a series of crazy three-dimensional worlds filled with various activities.

name: River Town Factory
summary: If possible, would you like to go back to ancient times to start a factory, refine oil, or even build a large computer? With the accidental fall of a meteorite, you traveled back to River Town a thousand years ago and became a workshop owner. And the story will begin from here……

name: Rich Girls
summary: "Rich Girls" is a casual board game / strategy game based on cards, dice and land properties. Players play the role of a gentleman, encountering various business ladies, and fighting against each others in the world of business war.

name: Rinse and Repeat
summary: Rinse And Repeat is a short retro-inspired (PS1/vhs) first-person horror game with multiple endings. It's inspired by childhood fears of closing your eyes in the shower.

name: Rise of Enigmas
summary: These are series of enigmas games. Enjoy thinking about puzzles.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 04
summary: Collect two twin-cylinder supersports with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 04!

name: Ride 5: Racing Icons Pack
summary: With RIDE 5 - Racing Icons Pack, you can race iconic bikes on a track that has been the scene of many memorable races, Estoril!

name: Ribbit
summary: Frogger clone

name: Risk of Rain: Hostile Worlds
summary: Risk of Rain: Hostile Worlds is a mobile adaptation of Risk of Rain, providing a familiar gameplay style with ARPG and run-and-gun elements. Assemble your squad, secure precious loot, and decimate relentless hordes of enemies!

name: Ride 5: Born to Race Pack
summary: Fast, powerful and extreme: collect bikes specifically designed for track use with RIDE 5 - Born to Race Pack and let loose on the Vallelunga circuit!

name: Rise of the Eternal
summary: Rise of the Eternal is a 2D-side scroller developed in Unreal Engine 5. It has beat'em up aspects and boss battles. In Early Access players have access to the first level of the game as well as one enemy type.

name: Right or Die!
summary: Navigate an ever changing maze where every turn could be your last...

name: Risk: Global Domination - Dune Map Pack
summary: Engage in strategic warfare across spice-rich deserts, Fremen sietches, and sprawling cities with these five limited release maps inspired by Dune: Part Two.

name: Rise Eterna War
summary: Rise Eterna War tells the bloody tale of Arthbane, a great general who led the last stand to reclaim his homeland Ars Rare from foreign invaders. Play as Arthbane, 10 years before the events of Rise Eterna, rallying loyalists in a desperate bid to seize the capital Gaiacus.

name: Rival Commanders
summary: Strategic war planning, battle attack/defense tactics, colony base construction, and effective management of resources are all essential for domination in RTS Tactical Warfare. Expand your influence, forge alliances, and outmaneuver rival commanders

name: RimWorld: Anomaly
summary: Darkness stirs on the rim. Survive flesh infestations, cultist attacks, shambling undead, blood rains, invisible hunters, and other sanity-shredding perils. Capture and study entities to harness the power of the void. Conduct psychic rituals and awaken an evil machine god.

name: Riptide
summary: In Riptide, gear up your ship, customize your loadout, and fight for the fleet! Riptide is a spaceship combat game with an emphasis on powerful customizations and utility. Accomplish your mission by loading up and taking out the enemy.

name: River Attack
summary: Embark on an exciting journey inspired by classics, facing challenges along the river, rescuing refugees, and demolishing obstacles. Acquire airplanes, collect power-ups, and choose between Classic and Mission modes. An intense experience awaits you!

name: R.I.P. Curl
summary: R.I.P. Curl is a scientifically accurate surfing simulator featuring four different playable characters, four rounded corners, and many many many waves, sharks and bombs.

name: Ring Craft
summary: In "Ring Craft," you will play as a ring forging master, using various materials to add useful or useless attributes to the rings. You will explore the secrets of nutrition, oop, I mean, enchantment. Whether it's miracles-craft or disaster-craft, it's all up to you!

name: Ringside Seat
summary: You manage the greatest boxers of all time.

name: Ringo's Roundup
summary: Solve grid-based puzzles, guide Postbunny Ringo's car through a variety of environments and collect all the scattered envelopes in this cute pathfinding puzzle game!

name: Rigid
summary: Rigid is a fast-paced game all about sick parkour action at high speeds.

name: Rising Sands
summary: Discover the secrets of what really happened after the war.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 05
summary: Maneuverability and power in one package: RIDE 5 - Free Pack 05!

name: Riftstrider
summary: Riftstrider is a deckbuilding roguelite with a twist - your deck is a 2D grid of orbs. Link elemental orbs to unleash powerful combos while battling foes through ever-shifting rifts in spacetime. Each run is a new adventure.

name: Rime's Quest
summary: Rime's Quest is an exciting adventure in the world of the Roman Empire, where an ordinary traveler decides to leave his everyday life and go on a dangerous journey. During the game, the player will go on an epic quest full of interesting events, riddles and encounters with numerous enemies.

name: Riri: Origin of Surabaya
summary: For youngsters who have visited Surabaya, surely they already know about the statue of Crocodile and Sharks which is the symbol of Surabaya. According to the community, sharks and crocodiles used to exist. And they love to fight. Exactly as depicted in the statue. What is their story? And is it true that the name Surabaya is taken from that story? Come download and follow the full story in Riri Surabaya and Its Origins.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 06
summary: Break the mold with RIDE 5 - Free Pack 06 - don't miss out on two reckless naked bikes!

name: Ride 5: Speed With Style Pack
summary: With RIDE 5 - Speed With Style Pack you can experience the joy of riding motorcycles, combining design with exceptional performance, at the spectacular Fuji Speedway!

name: Rift Riff
summary: Rift Riff is a minimalistic tower defense game. Build towers at strategic locations and survive increasingly more difficult waves of enemies.

name: Rift Walker
summary: Rift Walker is an open world 2D puzzle platformer where humanity is many thousands of years in the future and you've stumbled your way into this new world only to find that it's been... torn apart?

name: Riding to Bounce City: Babydoll Set A
summary: Unique babydoll lingerie for CherryRuby, Eve, and Jeanne.

name: Riverside Gals
summary: This game is a school battle action game that incorporates simulation elements of ally selection into belt-scrolling action. You can bring up to 12 allies with you. Players are 1 MOB, and aim to conquer the game while being protected by strong gals and sometimes assisting allies.

name: Riki
summary: Help ranger Riki to fight an unknown menace which could destroy not only the Amazon forest but the entire world. A fast and yet challenging game.

name: Rite of Eris
summary: Rite of Eris is a survival roguelike inspired by the likes of Vampire Survivors, Hades, and more. Unlock new characters, each with their own unique abilities, then jump into battle, unlocking powerful abilities along the way to aid your conquest against hordes of enemies.

name: Ring of Power
summary: The player has to find the Ring of Power.

name: Rise of Industry 2
summary: Navigate the competitive industrial landscape of vibrant 1980's USA! Make strategic manufacturing decisions, optimize production chains, acquire technologies, and expand your global business network with key contacts. Opportunities await those savvy enough to capitalize on them!

name: Rivers of Chaos
summary: Conquer the galaxy in this cinematic, battle-simulator. Each playthrough offering a completely unique galaxy, over 100 total specialized ships to command, and distinct commanders to lead your people. Pick your favorite faction and lead your forces into a dynamically generated battlefield.

name: Rise of the Village Hero
summary: Rise of the Village Hero is an indie RPG game inspired by classics. Explore levels, uncover and complete quests through dialogue with NPCs. Find and receive equipment and treasures, slay monsters to earn your title as the Hero of Drobroja.

name: Risky Chronicles and the Curse of Destiny
summary: Embark on the role of Risky, our fearless adventurer, in an epic 2D and 3D adventure! Explore the enchanting worlds of this modern platform/adventure game.

name: Ringo Party
summary: Join the hilarity in Ringo Party, a local 8-player party game brimming with a diverse range of whimsical mini-games. Challenge your friends with entertaining gadgets and unpredictable gameplay. Perfect for game nights, Ringo Party is a laughter-filled experience where fun reigns supreme!

name: Rise of the Outcast Hero
summary: Embark on a crazy journey as an amnesiac protagonist caught in a war between humans and demihumans...Solve their problems while you fuck and breed every single female demihuman alive, including orcs, elfs, dragon-kin and many others.

name: Rivals Duel: Card Battler
summary: Rivals Duel: Card Battler is an enthralling card game set in the world of military strategy and combat. Step into the boots of a commander and lead your forces to victory in this engaging card-battling experience. Build your deck of unique and vibrant cards and battle against other players!

name: Ridge Racer: Turbo Mode
summary: An updated version of Ridge Racer for the PlayStation, included as a bonus disc alongside Ridge Racer Type 4, and as a limited promotional release in some territories. Unlike the original 1994 PlayStation release, this runs at 60 fps, features higher quality polygonal models and utilises Gouraud shaded textures.

name: Rich Worker Simulator
summary: Move freely around the 100KM² world, work, earn and have fun! Towns, mountains, swimmable lakes, junkyards, gas stations, long roads, farming areas, construction sites and much more. There's a lot of work to be done, a lot of money to be made. Powered by Unreal Engine 5

name: Rise
summary: R.I.S.E is a cyberpunk action roguelike with intense combat, a focus on strategy, and endless progression. As a gladiator clone you must compete in the ETERNAL CONFLICT, a cycle of dystopian combat and bloodshed for the sake of humanity’s twisted entertainment and sponsored by Mega-Corporations across the galaxy.

name: Rich City
summary: Rich City - Real-time strategy and clicker in one person. Take the reins and make a real economic oasis in the middle of an empty meadow! Build and demolish buildings, collect profits, fulfill the demands of the citizens and you will definitely be rewarded for your labors!

name: Rise & Muse
summary: "Rise & Muse" is a single-player game that blends RPG, deck-building, and Roguelike elements. Set in the land of Muse, you will engage in strategic battles against formidable enemies, unravel the seal of the male deity, defeat the goddess, and restore world order.

name: Rime
summary:
You stumble across an old book and get trapped within its world.
Solve all of its mysteries, and escape the world of the book.

name: Rich School Girl Simulator
summary:
Rich School Girl Simulator: High School Life Days
Do fun with a rich high school girl game at the school life girl fashion games.
Enjoy your school life days in rich high school girl simulator game to do fun.
We will explain the life of a rich school girl who take admission in high school for his bright future in high school simulator. For this reason, she will not follow the high school rules and resolutions in popular rich girls in the high school. A rich girl on their first day at high school, she will go to the classroom for taking first lectures in the virtual high school girl simulator game.

name: Rivals of Aether: Speedrunner Mario
summary: A mod which adds Speedrunner Mario from the Something About series by TerminalMontage to Rivals of Aether.

name: Rivals of Aether: 100% Accurate Fox
summary: A mod which adds 100% Accurate Fox (aka Melee Fox) from the Something About series by TerminalMontage to Rivals of Aether.

name: Risorgimento Represso
summary: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Michael J. Coyne for The 9th Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Ridgeside Village
summary: An expansive mod for Stardew Valley, Ridgeside Village adds over 50 new NPCs, a new location, new items, new shops, new festivals, custom music, custom quests, and more!

name: Rise of Robots
summary: Rise of Robots is a Roguelite Shooter where you build a powerful weapon as you fight to survive ever increasing swarms of robots. Stack powerups to create a unique weapon each run and beat the challenge on each map

name: Riser of Babel
summary: Avoid all obstacles and get high as you can! Riser of Babel is endless 2d jump platform puzzle game. Stack different style blocks for your character and run for higher score! Master stacking tower and challenge for avoid falling debris and critical lighting!

name: Ribbit Channel
summary: Ribbit Channel is a short interactive cartoon. Graphics is done entirely in claymation, and the game itself is filled with color and warmth. The bright plasticine world could motivate anyone to sculpt from modelling clay, and perhaps remind you of your childhood. Ribbit Channel will make you happier and cheer you up on a rainy day.

name: RISK: Global Domination - Viking Legends Map Pack
summary: Step into the realms of Norse mythology with these maps inspired by great Viking myths and legends.

name: Rita
summary: Rita is a cozy adventure where a little chicklet solves word-based puzzles to transform the world around her. Follow her story across generations, meet her grandchicklet, and be a part of her legacy.

name: Rimland
summary: "Rimland" is an ARPG that invites players to explore a mysterious world. In the game, players can develop their characters, collecting equipment to enhance characters’ strength. The game offers a variety of gameplay, allowing players to play with different skill combinations and equipment setups.

name: RiseExplosion
summary: Easy rolling action game. Surmount the obstacles to get to the goal.

name: Ritual
summary:
Inspired by the Ludum Dare 'Summoning' theme but NOT an entry.
I originally made this as a test to see if I can start a game on Friday night and have something with a playable ending before the end of Sunday, that version only had one ending that I have since fleshed out a little.

Despite the page/logo looking all moody this game doesn't take itself too seriously!
It's only a small, simple game but I hope you enjoy :)

name: Rine: The Trail of Fireflies
summary: Embark yourself in a journey about light, fireflies and a cute little blue fox. Help Rine befriend the fireflies along the way. They will guide him to solve the mystery of the missing light.

name: Rising Army
summary: A strategy camp sim game where you manage and command your army, training each individual troop and upgrading your camp. Satisfy your King by completing missions and epic battles against enemies. Lead your Lord to legend!

name: Ridgeside Village: NPC Adventures
summary: Ridgeside Village's official content pack for NPC Adventures!

name: Rider's Spirits
summary: Are you ready to display your riding skills?

name: Riviera: The Promised Land
summary:
The first entry in the Department Heaven Episodes, Riviera: The Promised Land, comes back as a remastered release. Various additional features have been implemented, significantly upgrading playability. From newcomers to returning players, it is packed with satisfying elements.

Remastered Features

Change the background music between five different sound sources.
Play at up to 5x speed.
Skip event scenes.
All illustrations are in high-definition resolution.
Auto-save.
Difficulty level and mode select options increase playability.
Boost feature enables quick skill learning.
A more user-friendly interface.
Touchscreen support.
Freely switch between Japanese and English voice-overs.
Note: Text is Japanese-only.
And more!

name: Ride Kamens
summary: Ride Kamens is a free-to-play Japanese mobile game developed by Liber Entertainment for both Apple iOS and Android devices. The game is a spin-off of the overall Kamen Rider Series and set in its own unique world.

name: Ring Man in the Castle
summary:
"Play as Ring Man and venture through an old Wily castle at Dr Cossack's request.

Complete four levels and battle 5 bosses in this short fangame.

Made with Megamix Engine."

name: Rise of the Bugs
summary: RISE OF THE BUGS is a 2D pixel art adventure game about annoying bugs. Lead a colony in search of new food, discover the secrets of mutation and escape from the angry men on the kitchen. Will you be able to steal the mysterious sauce or you die crushed under a slipper?

name: River God: Enshrouded Current
summary: Embark on a journey with "River God: Enshrouded Current," where an ancient village battles a curse woven into its very fabric. Uncover the secrets of a malevolent priest whose dark rituals connect the village to a realm beyond life.

name: Ribbit Rampage
summary: An arcade-style top-down shooter where your only weapon is your froggy tongue. Eat hoardes of enemy insects in frantic, high-precision fights that demand clever decision-making. Don't get surrounded - it's one hit and you're croaked.

name: Rise of Castles
summary: Build and upgrade your castle, forge powerful legions led by heroes and dragons. Dive into strategy with a comprehensive tech tree, unique specialization towers, developing crucial attributes for the advancement of your empire. Form strategic alliances in epic seasons.

name: Rise & Fall: Online Digital Edition
summary: Risse & Fall is a game involving strategic units positioning, territory control and opportunity seizing designed by Christophe Boelinger (Dungeon Twister, Earth Reborn, Archipelago, Living Planet...). Each player leads a nation trying to expand and progress in a fantasy world.

name: Rise of Tochos
summary: Take action in this immersive 3D experience where you can build your own village, command your troops into battle, and plunder resources from enemies.

name: Riddle Tower
summary:
Will you manage to help Prince Monkid, dear friend?
Climb all levels to finish the game. In the levels you will find fun riddles, math puzzles and complex rebus. Just be patient because some are really hard.

Solve your daily riddle to climb to the top and if you stuck don't worry as if you use some hints you get riddles and answers to help you continue your journey.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Devotion Update
summary: Packed with an array of exciting content, this free update addresses various item and map bugs across both the base game and the Survivors of the Void expansion. It also includes a super awesome collaboration…..

name: Ring Academy
summary: In 'Ring Academy', you'll embark on a surreal journey as the newest student at a school like no other. Your path to navigating this bizarre institution involves throwing rings to progress through levels, each more whimsical and eerie than the last. Prepare for the strangest classes you've ever attended, taught by eccentric teachers who are anything but normal.

name: Rick and Morty Game
summary: The most epic (unofficial) Arduboy Rick and Morty game.

name: River City Girls 2: Double Dragon DLC
summary: River City Girls 2: Double Dragon DLC is an upcoming DLC for River City Girls 2 which adds in Billy and Jimmy from Double Dragon as playable characters.

name: Rise Of Anupet
summary: Ready for a high action arena shooter based on the re-imaginary storyline of Stargate

name: Risk of Rain 2: Starstorm 2
summary: Starstorm 2 is a work-in-progress adaptation of the Risk of Rain 1 mod "Starstorm". It currently features four new survivors, three new monsters, over 20 new items and equipment, and numerous new challenges to shake up your runs.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Aetherium
summary: Aetherium is a variety pack mod for Risk of Rain 2 that adds in a wide range of items, equipment, artifacts, and more!

name: Rise of Kenshin
summary: Demons invasion, the young heroes face the heavy siege of the enemy, they fought in blood and finally recovered the lost land. This is a national style Roguelike casual game, players can play a variety of roles, gradually grow, and experience the hearty grass-cutting battles.

name: Ritter & Rotwein
summary: The Past is red. And some Knights recalling it. Storis about the moust Gloryes Duels, sharp weapons and eaven sharper minds. Always looking for wealth, sweet Ladies, and the truth. You play as Ragdoll-Knights with diferent Wappons and Armor Sets out of the 15th century.

name: Rinbo
summary: Embark on an epic adventure of gliding and battling through mystical lands in RINBO, where discovery awaits at every turn!

name: Rim: Soul Jar
summary: RIM: Soul Jar is a hack and slash roguelite set in a world where medieval and futuristic elements mix. Become a warrior who has fallen into the past and embark on a journey to save the future with the Soul Jar. Cleanse dungeons of enemies and bosses, and set out to break the cycle of RIM.

name: Riftcast
summary: A cyber companion for your desktop inspired by LCD virtual pets of old. Collect, train and fight all sorts of Reverians as you take on daring ventures, fun mini-games and fierce battles.

name: RimWorld: Console Edition - Ideology
summary:
WHAT DO YOU BELIEVE?
With the Ideology expansion, each person in the game gets a belief system. Everything is customizable. You can build mind-bending temples, hold unforgettable rituals, hunt the venerated relics of your belief system, and seek transcendence beyond reality in the new, epic archonexus endgame. Discover new ways to experience RimWorld Console Edition with the Ideology expansion.

name: Rise of the White Sun: The Yellow Way
summary: Near Anyang, an alliance between a Yellow Way master and a mysterious man claiming to be a ninth-generation descendant of the Ming dynasty has sparked an outright rebellion against the Republic.

name: Riddlewood Manor
summary: Welcome to Riddlewood Manor, a delightfully spooky point & click horror adventure. On a mission to purify these haunted halls, you will solve puzzles, meet strange characters, and purge malevolent spirits. Uncover the dark history of the Riddlewoods, but first, you’ll have to survive a demonic doll.

name: Ring Sculptors
summary: A gripping text-based narrative adventure set in a dystopian future where your choices truly matter.

name: Richard Scarry’s Busytown: Best Math Ever
Ride or Die: A Bad Boy Romance - Book 1
summary: Ride or Die: A Bad Boy Romance is the first and only book of the Ride or Die: A Bad Boy Romance series.

name: Rivals with Benefits
summary: Rivals with Benefits is the second book of the Roommates with Benefits series. It succeeds its first book, Roommates with Benefits.

name: Rising Tides
summary: Rising Tides is the first and only book of the Rising Tides series.

name: Rise Eterna Bundle
summary: This bundle contains Rise Eterna & Rise Eterna War

name: Rip Connections
summary: Rip Connections is a SiIvaGunner inspired version based on Connections by The New York Times. The game showcases various rips from the channel and the player is tasked to sort them into 4 groups. Examples for these groups include a common source between rips, event day or theme of game ripped.

name: Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition
summary:
Immerse yourself in a scenic horse ranch to experience the joy and pride of caring for a world-class stable of horses in Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition.
With the help of a friendly mentor, you’ll raise charming foals, care for and train a stable of unique horses, and compete to become a champion racer and rider.

name: Risky Bison
summary: Risky Bison is a game about managing the financial affairs of a herd of buffalo, from the creator of Fantastic Arcade favorite Enviro Bear 2000 and Desert Golfing.

name: Ridge Racer V: Arcade Battle
summary:
Ridge Racer V: Arcade Battle is a racing arcade game developed by Namco and released in 2000. It runs on Namco's System 246 hardware and is the ninth installment in the Ridge Racer series. The game is inspired by Ridge Racer V for the Sony PlayStation 2, which was released earlier the same year. In this version, two players can race head-to-head, a reduction from the eight-player support found in Ridge Racer 2 and Rave Racer. Players can choose from six new cars and race on one of five new tracks: "Park Town," "Outer Pass," "Above the City," "Bayside Line," and "Sunny Beach." The "Sunny Beach" track is a shorter version of the original Ridge Racer track, featuring updated graphics.

To activate "Time Trial" mode, players must hold down the "View Change Button" (introduced in Rave Racer) after inserting a coin and keep it pressed until they have selected their car. Once activated, "T.T" will appear on the track selection screen. Ridge Racer V: Arcade Battle marks the final arcade release in the Ridge Racer series.

name: Risimon
summary: Risimon is an adventure & monster-taming game combining an off-the-wall tone with a retro, yet restyled, aesthetic. Experience a hilarious journey across the Issou region. Catch Risimon, train them and fight to prove to yourself that you are NOT a loser!

name: Risk of Rain: Meridian
summary: Meridian is a fanmade Risk of Rain expansion pack, adding new content to many areas of the game. It focuses heavily on the rich world of Petrichor V, both in its vast and lively stages, and a plethora of new enemies and elite types to inhabit them.

name: Ribbet
summary: Join Ribbet, the young and mischievous frog, on an exciting adventure in this action-packed video game! Take on the role of Ribbet as you navigate through a myriad of challenging hazards and obstacles. With his small stature and incredible parkour skills, he can escape from any sticky situation.

name: Risk of Rain 2 + Survivors of the Void + Seekers of the Storm Bundle
summary: Unleash the critically acclaimed Risk of Rain 2 and its first two expansions! This bundle includes Risk of Rain 2, the Survivors of the Void DLC, and the Seekers of the Storm DLC.

name: Rising Up
summary: Unleash office mayhem! Leaving a trail of paperwork, shattered furniture, and fallen co-workers as you battle your way to the top!

name: Ritual Chamber
summary: Dive into the depths of Hell's Vestibule as a gunned Ritualist. Fight off roaming scores of monsters by empowering your firearms with spells and Rituals in a fast-paced dungeon crawler roguelike.

name: Riot Ride
summary: Riot Ride is a car-combat roguelike where you play as a car in retro and Tron-like vibes. Speed, drift, and pull off the craziest maneuvers while crushing challenging enemies and bosses with endless synergies of weapons and items.

name: Rival Stars Horse Racing
summary:
Breed and train horses, manage your stable, and race to become a champion!
Whether you’re a fan of derby racing, animal games or pet horses, your exciting horse simulation journey begins with Rival Stars Horse Racing.

name: River of Rage
summary:
Two park rangers have been asked to monitor the end of the infamous grade five Tully river rapids, and to help anyone in trouble.

With a storm approaching and a dangerous criminal on the loose, surely no one would be crazy enough to risk coming through this part of the river. But some rafters love to push the limits...

name: Riding the Wave
summary:
This short little game is intended to be a calm, meditative experience.

It takes around 10-20 minutes to complete, depending on how quickly the riddles are solved.

Some corners have to be thought around, but in the end it's quite simple.

name: Riddle Tower: Halloween DLC
summary: Monkid is here to celebrate Halloween with a DLC featuring 25 new spooky-themed levels. Follow his journey to the spooky castle and test your brain in these fresh adventures.

name: Rise of a Legend
summary: Rise of a Legend is a third-person action RPG that immerses you in the ruthless era of gladiatorial combat. Engage in rich single-player progression or take on challengers in online multiplayer matches. Manage your Ludus, level up your fighters, and boost your house's prestige with every victory.

name: Rising Heat
summary: Rising Heat is a fast-paced horde survival game combining momentum-based movement with strategic, deck-builder-style upgrades. Play the demo today and face waves of cyborg enemies, multi-stage bosses, and bullet-hell battles. Customize your build with powerful ‘hacks,’ discover synergies, and unlock new pilots and ships for endless variety. Experiment with Rising Heat’s Fusion mechanic to create unique playstyles and dominate the arena!

name: Rift Drift
summary: Rift Drift is a momentum based drifting game, featuring infinite and time trail based game modes in a variety of procedurally generated levels & biomes.

name: Rise of the Half Moon
summary: Play a card game against the moon and test your knowledge of the lunar cycle.

name: Rise of The Newborns
summary: In a dystopian world consumed by the VAS, become one of the Newborn: A new generation of humans immune to the plague, surviving the ravages of disease, mutants, and sinister AXIOM. Fight for hope, rise against the odds, and pave the way for society to be reborn in a unique online sandbox RPG.

name: Ribbit Rogue
summary: Dice deckbuilding roguelike for the Playdate

name: Ring Fit Adventure: Rhythm Game
summary: This update adds the Rhythm Game, a new mode which allows the player to exercise to music from the game as well as music from other Nintendo games, such as Super Mario Odyssey, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Splatoon 2, and Wii Fit. The update also adds a female and multiple language voice options for Ring.

name: Rise of the Pawn
summary: Rise of the Pawn is a chess and poker hybrid strategy game.

name: Ritual Tides
summary: Ritual Tides is an first-person horror game set on a fictional British island, drenched with Lovecraftian terrors.

name: Rivalhearts
summary: Join Noah in his first year of university as he decides to overcome his heartache, pursuing either a tomboy classmate, gorgeous doctor, or junior-year goth!

name: River City Saga: Three Kingdoms Next
summary: In this second part of River City Saga: Three Kingdoms, our beloved hot-blooded high-schooler from River City, Kunio (Guan Yu) charges his way through to the apex chapter of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, the Battle of Wuzhang Plains. Experience a comedic twist on the classic tale, featuring a cast of over 100 characters!

name: Ricave
summary: Ricave is a turn-based, first-person dungeon crawler inspired by the wild nature of traditional roguelikes and designed around readability, intuitive mechanics, and transparency.

name: Riki 8Bit Game Collection
summary: Riki 8bit Game Collection is not just one experience, but many. To be precise, it includes five unique games and music albums. Kira Kira Star Night lets you collect stars while running through a pixelated, surreal cityscape. In Astro Ninja Man DX, you defend against threats from above by shooting upwards—just like in the classic arcade games of the 70s and 80s. And the trilogy of albums—8bit Music Power, 8bit Music Power Final, and 8bit Music Power Encore—will stay with you long after you turn off the power.

name: Right Turn
summary: Challenge your attention to detail and driving skills in this 3D psychological thriller. Spot the anomalies and take a right turn to draw closer to the exit. Fail and be forced to start over!

name: Rise of the Left Overs
summary: Calling all Punch-Out lovers, horror meets knockout punches in this scary but hilariously animated beat'em up game. This hand drawn animated game is as simple as the classical NES game title with extras and will keep you laughing to the end!

name: 'Rift' Electric
summary: 'RIFT' Electric is a first person puzzle game where you take a questionable job listing and must enter strange homes to turn off all the lights. Using a lens that reveals hidden objects and electrical connections, you must figure how the rooms are wired to escape safely.

name: Rivenaar's Grove
summary: Harvest ingredients for potions to prove your worth as the apprentice of a skilled magician!

name: Ringer
summary: The marble roguelike. Ringer reinvents the classic game of marbles with a deckbuilding twist. Discover game breaking synergies, defeat menacing bosses, and accumulate an ever increasing score in this thrilling roguelike

name: Rivals Hover League
summary: 'Rivals Hover League' is a vehicular combat PvP game where players battle in arenas across the galaxy using hover vehicles with various abilities. Join your teammates and show off your skills - hover, boost, shoot your way to become the MVP!

name: River Towns
summary: Solve puzzles by placing buildings and creating vibrant cities in River Towns. Each district has its own style and shapes, making every level a new challenge. Help to restore and rebuild our River Towns.

name: Rise of Eros: Desire
summary: "Rise of Eros: Desire" is a AAA mobile game crafted with a realistic 3D style, featuring 360-degree real-time visuals that showcase the characters' finely detailed facial features and every inch of their skin. The game is designed with top-tier standards in visuals and sound effects, while also offering deep strategic gameplay and character development mechanics, providing players with a thrilling fantasy adventure.

name: Rivals of Aether: Mario Pissing
