summary: Rivals of Aether: Mario Pissing is custom character mod based on the YouTube video "Mario Pissing", complete with full moveset, for Rivals of Aether.

name: Ride Hailing Simulator
summary: Come and experience the feeling of a ride hailing driver, listening to orders, running orders, and charging new energy vehicles! Complete the task list, look at the speedometer, listen to music, and enjoy leisure time!

name: Rise Of Dune
summary: In a future where the Solar System's resources have dried up, civilizations old and new converge on the unforgiving sands of Dune. Here, in the heat of battle, you'll carve out your own kingdom on a vast planetary landscape. Form alliances or rivalries with players across the globe as you vie to capture the “City of Kings” and secure your place in this war-torn world.

name: Ritual
summary: A single player episode with 6+4 levels and start map made by Zothique and Sock.

name: Rivals: Esports Manager
summary: Take over a promising team and make it into a lasting eSports empire. Watch your team win in this highlight-packed, PvP Esports MOBA Manager

name: Rivals of Aether: Mickey's Speedway USA
Ridiculous Shipping
summary: Ridiculous Shipping is a strategy simulation game about running a chaotic sea port. Take charge of unique ports around the world, unload ships, and get every container to its destination using cranes, drones, trucks, and ridiculous buildings like shark-filled aquariums.

name: Rise Eterna II
summary: Improving on the tactical RPG genre at the core of the first iteration, Rise Eterna 2 places you in the middle of an ongoing war between two families coveting the kingdom’s throne and one plotting her revenge.

name: Ridiculous Glitching
summary: A co-op/singleplayer game about the real villain of the arcades and games: the Glitches!

name: River Climbing
summary: In this game, you control your character using only a stick that you wave around to latch onto rocks, logs, and other obstacles, propelling yourself up a dangerous and winding river. Master the delicate art of hooking and pulling as you navigate swift currents, turbulent rapids, and treacherous whirlpools. Every latch gets you closer to the source of the river, where eternal glory awaits. But be careful—one slip of the stick can send you tumbling back downstream, undoing all your progress.

name: Rise of the Underdog King!
summary: 《Rise of the Underdog King》 is a text-based adventure game inspired by Wish-fulfillment fiction and webisode. Deliver satisfying comebacks and take control of your destiny as you rise above every challenge!

name: Risk & Riches
summary: This roguelite deckbuilder is set in the American West. Battle monsters, cultists, and folkloric creatures while searching for gold and the source of the evil within a mine. You choose when to leave, not where to go. Will you play it safe returning to the surface, or risk it all by going deeper?

name: Rise of Elements
summary: Rise of Elements is a Match-3 style narrative puzzle game with classic RPG elements, where players will clash for victory. Compete in Argos’s Tournament of Champions to achieve elemental mastery and rid the world of Aetheron of the Void’s looming threat.

name: RimFolk
summary: RimFolk is a multiplayer open-world survival simulator set in a post-nuclear apocalyptic future. Explore the mysteries of the wasteland alone or with friends, craft items, build a base, hunt monsters and fight against other survivors to last another night.

name: Riichi Advanced
summary: Infinitely extensible mahjong web client.

name: Rios de Lluvia
summary: Rivers of Rain is a puzzle platform game where you play as Antonia and her grandfather, switching between both of them to solve different puzzles to complete their journey from the mountains to the sea.

name: Rig Riot
summary: A fast-paced third-person mech-action roguelike

name: River of Time Yarn
summary: Fixed-value RPG games, also similar to Evil spirit tower. Release different skills to restrain enemies. Observe the distribution of enemies, doors, and items on the map to find the appropriate route. The game has a rich story and four different difficulty levels.

name: Rinny Platformer Rage Game
summary: Rinny Platformer Rage Game is an indie shitpost game developed by santu1423 about Rinny, a character from Pretty Blood, gaining brain damage.

name: Rise Achlys
summary: Rise Achlys is a brutal gothic soulsvania and rogue-lite inspired by Castlevania. The story-driven game features a vampire protagonist and iconic characters like Dracula and Frankenstein, with time travel and fantasy themes. It also integrates unique music mechanics into the gameplay.

name: Rising Legion
summary: Betrayed by your king, in Raising Legion, a one-click rogue-like autobattler, you will gather an army and bring destruction. Enlist troops from 8 factions, each with their unique effects, and guide them to victory against over 60 different treacherous enemies.

name: Rise
summary: RISE is a first-person vignette by Dr Dakoda Barker about living with chronic health conditions. The narrative is simple – the player has to get out of bed, get dressed and leave their house for the day. But Barker expresses the complexities of living with chronic illness by implementing intentionally hostile game design. The controls are unwieldy and incredibly demanding, forcing the player to use the controller in unexpected ways, to ask someone near them to help with the controls – or to make more conservative choices, like being too exhausted to bother with cool boots and settle for simple canvas sneakers instead. RISE’s challenging controls are designed to give the player insight into the physicality of living with chronic illness and pain, and the constant domestic negotiations that come with it.

name: Riven Crown
summary:
Riven Crown is a dark, atmospheric Souls-like Action RPG where death is not the end but the beginning of a mythic descent through layered realms beyond life. Set in a decaying dimension ruled by a corrupt monarchy and haunted by the remnants of lost civilizations, the world is steeped in mystery, ritual, and the echoes of a forgotten society.

Blending classic Souls-like combat with a deep, combo-driven fighting system, Riven Crown introduces a fresh, high-skill twist to the genre. Each weapon comes with its own unique combo routes designed to be memorized, mastered, and chained together with precision. It's an approach that rewards muscle memory and strategic timing, especially during tense encounters with relentless, unforgiving enemies. We call it a “Souls-Fighter” a brutal fusion of methodical combat and stylish execution, built for players who crave both challenge and mastery.

name: Ridge Racer 8
summary: Cancelled mainline Ridge Racer title for Nintendo Switch.

name: Ritual Party
summary: In Ritual Party you get to summon Cthulhu with your friends! Work together (or not) with 1-4 players to perform wild rituals, unlocking cosmic horrors from the Cthulhu mythos. Chaotic party game where summoning eldritch beings is only half the fun!

name: Rise of the Penguins
summary: A retro penguin platformer designed for Gameboy. Perfect for fans of penguins and anyone looking for a moderate challenge in a cold setting!

name: Rising Angels: Judgment
summary: It has been a month since the crew of the Katajion spaceship Nimross returned safely after a mission to recover a prized artifact went awry. Command's support of how everything transpired is weak and many of her crew face disciplinary actions for their part in the operation. It all weighs heavily on Major Natalie Puccile, whose investigation led them down that route, but not nearly as much as the knowledge that she was forced to decide between the woman she cared about and her mission. With only a tankard and a collection of games to distract her from her life, Natalie begins to question why she signed up in the first place.

name: Rip & Tear
summary: Rip &Tear is a brutal top-down 2D arcade shooter where your shotgun is your only lifeline. Face endless waves of demons, cultists, and biomechanical horrors in a blood-soaked battle for survival. No gimmicks—just pure, relentless carnage.

name: Ribbits
summary:
Ribbits will add swamp villages full of tiny frog villagers called ribbits!
These little guys will sometimes sit down in groups to play music, which you can join in with!

Merchant and fisherman ribbits can be traded with for various items including the new ribbits plant blocks & maracas!
Sorcerer ribbits will occasionally cast spells to buff the player, and all gardener ribbits will water crops!

Ribbits will naturally return to their homes at night, but if you'd like to relocate them, you can reset their home point to their current position by right clicking them with amethyst.

name: Rinnetenjo
summary: A mysterious fog descended upon the town, changing their destinies.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Alloyed Collective
summary: Lured, enslaved, and left to rust. The Alloyed Collective now stirs from the scrap of their fallen allies, driven by a singular purpose: returning home. Master two new Survivors and descend deep into Petrichor V to take on the Alloyed Collective’s ultimate creation.

name: Risk the Dark
summary: Risk the Dark is an action-filled top-down roguelite set in harrowing darkness. Struggle to escape a shadowy, monster-infested cave while battling threat after threat. Using a variety of weapons, melee, as well as interactions with NPCs and items, light your way and Risk the Dark.

name: Ritual
summary: A very personal point-and-click horror Gameboy game I’m developing based on a short story I wrote.

name: Ritus Exorcismus
summary: Become the exorcist that the world needs! Use Holy Relics and the knowledge from your book to fight demonic possessions. Investigate unholy events and take part in church rituals in this medieval pixel horror game.

name: Rinth
summary:
Rinth is an old school dungeon rpg with 90s style.

Enter the dungeons and face different monsters and bosses.

Collect weapons, buy/sell and craft them to get even better ones.

name: Risk: The Official Game
summary: RISK: The Official Game offers players to play the classic board game on their i-device. The game features the same rules as the board game in three different modes:

name: Richat Structure
summary: Strategic excavation simulator. Dig deep into the mysterious Earth's bullseye, build underground bases and study anomalous finds. The deeper your miners advance, the more questions this geo-phenomenon raises. Will you be able to unearth the true nature of the Richat Structure?

name: Riziki
summary:
In Africa, a couple of things unite us. We thought of three, our music, our rhythm, and our roots we want to explore that in our game Riziki.

Riziki is a rhythm game that immerses players in the vibrant music and dance culture of Africa. The game’s narrative revolves around Riziki, Nabo and Moja, who traverse the roots of Africa, each characterized by different music. As players progress, they unlock new songs and dances that reflect the cultures they came from, each bringing you closer to uniting Africa upon mastery. Riziki offers a unique experience of Africa's music from traditional folk to modern afrobeat, amapiano, rhumba and beyond.

name: Rise of Fati
summary: Step into the mythical world of "Rise of Fati," an epic adventure game where ancient African folklore and legends come to life. Embark on a journey with Fati, a young and brave warrior destined to restore peace and harmony to her homeland. Explore rich landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and battle formidable foes as you uncover the secrets of your heritage.

name: Rise of Fearless
summary: Rise of Fearless is the first full-scale African-inspired battle royale game, designed to bring African history, culture, and landmarks into competitive gaming. It features large-scale battles where players fight for survival, using strategy, skill, and teamwork. The game’s setting draws inspiration from Africa’s rich heritage, including real-world landmarks like the Great Rift Valley and Lalibela’s rock-hewn churches.

name: RimPark: A Burning World
summary:
RimPark is a next-gen web-native game where Players attempt to master the magical abilities of their chosen Guardian in a quest to best their opponents before the fire consumes all. The gameplay style mixes MOBA and Battle Royale elements in an experience that can be enjoyed solo or as part of a team.

No installs, no downloads, no waiting. Just FUN!

name: Riseon
summary: Riseon is an ultra-challenging jumping action game where the protagonist, trapped deep underground, leaps and climbs toward the open sky! With simple controls but extreme difficulty, every jump tests your skill and patience. Can you overcome the brutal challenge and reach the top?

name: River City Girls 1, 2, and Zero + Double Dragon DLC Bundle
summary: Three epic beat-'em-ups in one bone-crushing bundle...along with the DLC!

name: Ricochlime
summary: Ricochlime is a game where you attack the advancing monsters with your ricocheting projectiles. The game is made with the Flame game engine and Flutter.

name: Rising Wan
summary: Rising Wan is a short 2D platforming fighter in which the player controls a dog whose bone has been stolen, and the goal is to get the bone back by defeating enemies and a boss at the end.

name: RitualRX
summary: RitualRX is a brutally violent, blisteringly fast, adrenaline-filled shooter set within a pastel paradise ruled by cults. Control excommunicated sinners as you shoot, slash, and slaughter your way through a city where ritual is prescribed and the only treatment administered is an overdose of lead.

name: Riftopia
summary: We are a community battle game with a focus on growth and engagement on live service platforms!

name: Rise of the Vanguard
summary: Dive into Rise of the Vanguard! Team up with up to 7 players in thrilling PvE missions, where every challenge is unique thanks to our Dynamic Mission Generation system. Choose your class, battle fierce foes, and join scheduled playtests now! Are you ready to rise?

name: Rice & Rest
summary: Rice & Rest is a cozy narrative game where running a food truck leads to unexpected friendships. Cook meals and chat with quirky, heartfelt, and weird characters in a modern-fantasy city. Stuck far from home, you’ll soon find that food has a way of bringing people together.

name: Rise of Commander
summary: Rise of Commander: A New Era of Modern Warfare Begins! Commander, prepare yourself… A new generation of real-time strategy awaits!

name: Riven: The Sequel to Myst
summary:
“My worst fears have been realized. The damage is more extensive than previously imagined. I must act while there is still time. I must find someone… to send to Riven."

Enter a deceptively beautiful world torn apart by age-old conflicts, where secrets lie hidden at every turn, and nothing is as it seems. Search through dense jungles, awe-inspiring caverns and monolithic structures. Use your wits and powers of observation to solve devious puzzles and find secretive characters. Only then will you learn the truth about this troubled land and its inhabitants. You must let Riven become your world— before an entire world is lost.

This version of Riven features the original point-and-click gameplay style, with almost five thousand images and over three hours of full motion video.

name: Rise of the Penguins 2: Penguin's Dark Ascent
summary: Dive into 'Rise of the Penguins 2: Penguin's Dark Ascent' a thrilling 2D action-platformer where you battle bosses, throw snowballs, and challenge the Crimson Star cult in a world shrouded in Eternal Dusk.

name: Riftseekers
summary: Use your abilities to defeat enemies, avoid traps, collect gems, and score enough points to summon bosses. Defeat these bosses to open rifts to randomized biomes. Collect upgrades in-between stages to ensure survival. In this endless arcade-style roguelike, how many points can you get?

name: Rise of Shrooms
summary: A lighthearted, turn-based strategy game where you command an army of shroomies and conquer new lands. Roll the dice and plan your moves wisely—craft gear, hunt for resources, and draw powerful cards. With the right strategy and a bit of luck, your Mushroom Empire will rise to greatness!

name: Ribbit Up: Frog Climber
summary: You’ve been turned into a frog and thrown down! Take revenge on the witch by overcoming obstacles with nothing but your leaps. Play solo or with up to 10 players. In this challenging adventure to climb the castle, you’ll never know what your next jump will bring.

name: Ridiculous Gungame
summary: A fast-paced FPS. Kill with Piano's, Jelly, a Spectral Train, and some kind of Sword/Bow hybrid. It's kill or die laughing in this instagib gun game.

name: Ridiculous Space Battles
summary: RIDICULOUS SPACE BATTLES is the spiritual successor to the first ever autobattler game: Gratuitous Space Battles! After a fifteen year wait, the ridiculously over-the-top and completely unjustified battles in space ARE BACK.

name: RimWorld: Odyssey
summary: Explore exotic biomes, expand your mobile colony, and launch into space. Scavenge ancient tech on asteroids, abandoned space stations, and satellites. Find and defeat the mechanoid lair.

name: Rival Species
summary: In the far distant future of the 40th millennium behind the stars there is only war. Enter the universe of WARHAMMER 40,000 and play a mighty warrior for one out of an ever growing list of rival species. A large PvP team multiplayer mod for Half-Life that plays similary to Battlefield/Battlefront, based on the Game's Workshop property. Eventually Exterminatus, A sequel for the Source Engine would be made

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Hatsune Miku Music Pack
summary:
Join the one and only Hatsune Miku in a musical adventure with her OFFICIAL Music Pack!

Featuring SIX new Rhythm Rifts for:
- "Too Real" by Danny Baranowky feat. Hatsune Miku (free song!)
- "Intergalactic Bound" by Yunosuke & CircusP feat. Hatsune Miku
- "M@GICAL☆CURE! LOVE ♥ SHOT! by SAWTOWNE" feat. Hatsune Miku

- "Radiant Revival" by Jamie Paige feat. Hatsune Miku

Each Rhythm Rift comes with:

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Hatsune Miku - "Too Real"
summary: Face your demons with the official Rhythm Rift for "Too Real" by Danny Baranowky feat. Hatsune Miku! This track is part of the Hatsune Miku Music Pack.

name: Rioo
summary: The goddess of water who summoned you is nowhere to be found. Facing a tidal wave of monsters, you must join forces with other brave people who were summoned like you to repel them! Find the best combination of various strange weapons to survive the waves of attacks!

name: Rift War Tower Defense
summary: An eldritch-inspired 2D pixel art tower defense game. Take control of the battlefield and manage limited resources to spawn units and cast spells to defeat your enemy. Destroy the enemy rift portal before they destroy yours.

name: Rise & Ironfall: VD-dev Legacy Pack
summary: Dive into the heart of the resistance to repel the invasion… then hit the futuristic tracks in full arcade mode! The bundle delivers breathtaking solo, online, and local-split-screen action.

name: Rise to Mayhem
summary: Ascend a deadly tower, blast through waves of enemies, dodge incoming fire, battle fierce bosses, and chase high scores in explosive pixel-art action as a jetpack soldier.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Celeste - "Scattered and Lost"

summary: Fly high with the official Rhythm Rift for Intergalactic Bound feat. Hatsune Miku by Yunosuke & CircusP! This track is part of the Hatsune Miku Music Pack.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: hololive - "Bibbidiba"
summary: Experience your own fairy tale with the official Rhythm Rift for "BIBBIDIBA" by Hoshimachi Suisei!

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: hololive - "Carbonated Love"
summary: Feel the rush with the official Rhythm Rift for "Carbonated Love" by IRyS!

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Hololive - "Reflect"
summary: As a bonus, celebrate the graduated icon with the free Rhythm Rift, available now for everyone:""reflect"" by Gawr GuraThank you, legendary shark!

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: hololive - "Ahoy!! Warera Takara Kane Kaizoku-dan☆"
summary: Raise your voice with the official Rhythm Rift for "Ahoy!! 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆" by Houshou Marine!

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: hololive - "Play Dice!"
summary: Follow your heart with the official Rhythm Rift for "Play Dice!" by Hakos Baelz!

name: Right Click To Activate Translator
summary: Right Click To Activate Translator is a pixel side-scrolling language puzzle game. On your journey to find your missing pet cat "Shiro," you are transported to an otherworldly realm, facing an unfamiliar language and "Octocats." Remember, "Right Click to Open the Translator."

name: Ritenuto
summary: Scattered Rain and Scattered Brains

name: Risk: Pogo Domination
summary: Attack, defend, fortify and increase your territory as you battle against players to control the world in this classic board game. Strategically move your military units and roll dice to conquer lands.

name: Rik the Roadie
summary: Help long-suffering Rik the Roadie get the hit rockers Alternative Rock on stage for the gig in this slice of the rock n' roll lifestyle.

name: Ripley Remembered
summary: A surreal, story-driven puzzle game set on a train caught in a time loop. Solve narrative-driven puzzles, battle psychic bosses, and uncover the truth about memory, grief, and a girl named Ripley—before the day resets again. Pixel graphics, bullet hells, puzzles, and dialog.

name: Riddle of the Runes: The Worlds of TSR
summary: A puzzle game that's also a screensaver. Riddle of the Runes features over 200 pieces of fantasy artwork across D&D campaign settings. Find hidden clues in the images to discover the location of a stolen treasure.

name: Risky Rocket
summary: Risky Rocket is a 3D Rocket Jumping platformer. Hone your skills and launch through the climb map and many time trial levels. Using the physics of momentum, and propulsion of rockets to build up speed and become a master of Rocket Jumping.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Everhood - "Powers of Destruction"
summary: Try your hand at the official Rhythm Rift for "Powers of Destruction" by Cazok (free song!) This track is part of the Everhood Music Pack.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Everhood - "Why Oh You Are LOVE"
summary: Step into the light with the official Rhythm Rift for "Why Oh You Are LOVE" by Dancefloor is Lava. This track is part of the Everhood Music Pack.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Everhood - "Feisty Flowers"
summary: Get dazzled with the official Rhythm Rift for "Feisty Flowers" by Cazok. This track is part of the Everhood Music Pack.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Everhood - "Revenge"
summary: Don't be afraid with the official Rhythm Rift for "Revenge" by Cazok! This track is part of the Everhood Music Pack.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Everhood - "The Final Battle"
summary: Go all out with the official Rhythm Rift for "The Final Battle" by Cazok. This track is part of the Everhood Music Pack.

name: Rise of Rana
summary:
Rise of Rana is a single-player open-world action-adventure filled with humor, destruction, and complete freedom of movement.
Play as two main characters (with dozens of costumes and accessories) and explore massive cities where you can fight, complete missions, cause chaos, or just have fun.

name: Riftinvaders
summary: RIFTINVADERS is a fast-paced arcade game with hard difficulty, focused on aim training and endless action. Compete for top spots on the leaderboard, unlock achievements and get to the highest X-RUN possible. Enjoy also in seated VR!

name: Rising Odds
summary: Participate in the Death Game "Rising Odds", a psychological horror visual novel, with dark and gore themes. Your choices will decide how this story ends!

name: Rivals in the Skies
summary: Launch your Hyper Frame to liberate the sector from the iron grasp of the emperor! But beware: You aren't the only ace mecha pilot in this fight. The emperor's top pilots are holding the conquered zones, and they take their jobs personally.

name: Ricochet Squad
summary:
Ricochet Squad is a fast-paced, 3v3 multiplayer hero shooter for mobile devices, developed by Nice Plans Studio.

The gameplay is distinguished by its use of physics-driven combat and destructible environments, which encourages strategic teamwork over raw aiming skill.

name: RiftGuard
summary: RiftGuard is a dark auto-action roguelike. Manage resources, collect upgrades, and survive relentless enemy hordes in intense, strategic combat filled with blood and chaos.

name: Rise of Transport
summary: Enjoy the trill of vehicle simulation in this open-world transport RPG game.

name: Ring Toss Water Game
summary: Inspired by physical water ring toss games, a simple desktop companion to fidget with.

name: Rise to King Ortler
summary: A turn-based game inspired by classic board games - featuring 8 unlockable maps, items, special tiles, a campaign, free play mode, and a name editor for your characters. Supports up to 4 players or AI in local multiplayer. Colorful, fun, and family-friendly.

name: Ricochet Abyss
summary: Dive into Ricochet Abyss, a unique blend of tactical backpack management, hero-building, and pinball-style combat. Organize your inventory, equip powerful gear, and send your heroes ricocheting through perilous dungeons—every shot and item choice could be your key to survival!

name: Rimward Basilisk
summary:
The long war between Ulstania and Kostakovia was interrupted when a cyberweapon went catastrophically out of control. Follow the stories of the survivors as they fight and navigate through the fallout.

- Rimward basilisk is a precursor, inferior version of [Black Beacon Hill]

Development of Rimward Basilisk has been stopped. This game is no longer supported. Please do not download this game!

If you are interested in Rimward Basilisk, or had played it before, consider checking out [Black Beacon Hill] instead. It is the result of some serious self reflection and effort after i had made Rimward Basilisk.

name: Ripple Island: Kyle and Cal’s Restaurant
summary: The restaurant is packed and business is booming! Join forces with the quirky and wonderful animals of Ripple Island to cook and serve tons of tasty food!

name: Ricochet
summary: Battle your friends in exciting arenas with your epic arsenal. This is a 2D fighting game that utilizes platformer and shooter mechanics. The combat is ever-changing, and the art is simple but intriguing. Ricochet is fun, fast-paced, and it keeps you on your toes.

name: Rift
summary: Rift is a third person arcade-style shooter with elements of stealth, melee combat and tactical gameplay driven by a cinematic story bursting with twists and turns.

name: Rise From Ruin
summary: RISE FROM RUIN is a third-person, character-action game in which you take control of a massive, unstoppable monster, the BEAST. They aim to defend a vast, icy city from relentless, chaotic, hostile forces. The game offers bombastic gameplay and immense battles in which your sheer power is tested against ever-growing enemy forces.

name: Riyou
summary: Riyou is an RPG about nostalgia, childhood adventure, and close friends. Explore both your fondest memories and your darkest fears.

name: Richest Thief
summary: You sprint down a dusty road, diamonds clutched in your hand, fleeing thugs. You run through crumbling buildings, past ghosts of the past. Reaching the end of the road, you watch the thieves disappear into the darkness. The diamonds remain, a promise of freedom.

name: Riley The Roadrunner
summary: A speed demon who loves nothing more than to race. One morning, he and his partner in crime, Ollie the Armadillo, have a rude awakening when an Unidentified Flying Object plows through their tree. Next thing they know, weird alien tech is spreading all over their canyon home. Will Riley be fast enough to stop this other worldly menace?

name: Rite of the Dealer
summary: Rite of the Dealer is a roguelike multi-deckbuilder where you guide charming rat companions through a peculiar, otherworldly hotel.

name: Rip Current
summary: Rip Current is a horror game set in a cryptic research facility where genetic experiments, in a bid to strengthen aquatic ecosystems, have spiraled out of control. Navigate flooded corridors, uncover the fate of the scientists, and survive the prehistoric apex predators stalking the depths.

name: RimWorld: P-Music
summary: A popular music mod for RimWorld, which adds a set of 56 additional fanmade music tracks to the game.

name: Riftborn
summary: Spawn chaos, summon titans, and outlast the Collector’s Trial in this fast-paced tactical arena roguelite. Control Zor Luna, collect boosts, pull allies from the Rift, and keep your unit count alive. One team survives. The other vanishes.

name: Ricochet Raven
summary: Ricochet Raven is a fast paced side scrolling roguelike where you can only attack by deflecting enemy projectiles back at them! upgrade your deflection abilities by acquiring upgrade feathers as you make it through a run!

name: Rich Party
summary: Rich Party Remastered Version Returns with RenewalYou don't need to repurchase,This remake updated the original code structure， revised the game settings and added a new creative workshop.bringing players a new gaming experience.

name: Right & Left Column Battle
summary: Right & Left Column Battle is a turn-based roguelike strategy game. Its round loop (position reset, recruit units, choose columns, unit combat) hides randomness and rich decisions—200+ unique units, with countless build combinations to explore

name: Ripperdoc Simulator
summary: In Ripperdoc Simulator, you are the surgeon of the shadows. In the front, you run a dingy electronics shop in a crime-ridden district. In the back, you perform illegal implantations on desperate clients seeking power, beauty, or survival — no matter the cost.

name: Rick Henderson: Eternal Arena
summary: Rick Henderson is back! Join the endless arena battle, upgrade your ship, upgrade your guns, upgrade your drones. Fight, upgrade, die, repeat.

name: R.I.P.: Reincarnation Insurance Program
summary: In this virus-ravaged, post-apocalyptic world, you will wield the power of infinite resurrection to delve into perilous ruins, gather legendary gear, and draw strength from the gods—growing stronger through endless cycles, until you become a true savior legend.

name: Rift Survivors
summary: Rift Survivors is a 2D survivor-like game where you grow stronger by arranging your inventory. Equip items to unlock hidden powers and create your own unique build. Cross the rifts and survive against endless waves of enemies!

name: Riruri Tachibana: Reincarnated
summary: Haruka, who streams as the popular virtual streamer Riruri Tachibana. After a streaming accident, her everyday life quietly begins to crumble. What awaits her is a new stage—or an endless nightmare. A short first-person horror story themed around “reincarnation.”

name: Ribbit Ranch
summary: Ribbit Ranch is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Collect frogs and raise them in real time, then sell them to earn a profit! Customize your habitats by filling it with decorations, rare frog species and ultra-rare special frogs!

name: Ride Up
summary: The steepest climb between mind and body: Ride UP. Grab your bike and ascend through a world woven with delusions. Physics-based riding, brutal tracks, and a past that refuses to be remembered await you.

name: Rift Miner
summary: Rift Miner is a 3D voxel roguelite: mine resources against the clock, escape through the portal, and invest your haul in permanent upgrades. Unlock Echo Cards for powerful synergies. Brave the high-risk Deeper Rifts for even greater rewards.

name: RIP Party
summary: Throw a party at a maniac's mansion. RIP Party is a single player slasher horror game inspired by 80s & 90s horror movies where you and the NPCs are being hunted. Try and survive the micro sandbox experience.

summary: Drop the beat with the official Rhythm Rift for "New Game" by Nitro Fun. This track is part of the Monstercat Music Pack.

summary: Face the music with the official Rhythm Rift for "Final Boss" by Nitro Fun! This track is part of the Monstercat Music Pack.

summary: Stop waiting... for the official Rhythm Rift for "Waiting For You" by Unlike Pluto. This track is part of the Monstercat Music Pack.

summary: Sharpen thy shovel for the official Rhythm Rift for "High Above the Land (The Flying Machine)" by Jake Kaufman! This track is part of the Shovel Knight Music Pack.

summary: Sharpen thy shovel for the official Rhythm Rift for "In the Halls of the Usurper (Pridemoor Keep)" by Jake Kaufman! This track is part of the Shovel Knight Music Pack.

summary: Sharpen thy shovel for the official Rhythm Rift for "La Danse Macabre (Lich Yard)" by Jake Kaufman! This track is part of the Shovel Knight Music Pack.

name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Shovel Knight - "Strike the Earth! (Plains of Passage)" - Jake Kaufman
summary: Sharpen thy shovel for the official Rhythm Rift for "Strike the Earth! (Plains of Passage)" by Jake Kaufman! This track is part of the Shovel Knight Music Pack.

name: River City Ransom
summary:
Play as Alex and Ryan and cross River City to fight street gangs and save your girlfriend from the hands of a bad guy named "Slick."

Improve your fighting experience by powering-up your characters in River City's shops, picking-up items for bonuses and using the trash bins and pipes you will find in its streets.

Come and enjoy the original River City Ransom gameplay, that is still being praised nowadays!

name: Rizz Dungeon: Skeleton Key to My Heart
summary: Fighting is hard, right? Let your party do it for you! Romance Monster Girls and traverse the Dungeon! Hopefully they'll all get along... right?

name: Ride 6
summary: Live the thrill of asphalt and dirt with RIDE 6: affirm your biker identity by joining RIDE Fest, race with 250+ bikes from different categories and prove you're the best by challenging real motorcycling legends.

name: Rift Wars
summary:
Welcome to Rift Wars, a real-time strategy game where you'll collect powerful mutants, upgrade your squad, and face off against players from around the world in fast-paced PvP battles. Outsmart your opponents, win matches, and climb the ranks to become a legend.
Jump into the arena, build your squad, and master real-time PvP strategy. Whether you're climbing the leaderboard or experimenting with new tactics, Rift Wars delivers nonstop action. Enter the arena, evolve your strategy, and crush your rivals in the ultimate mutant-fueled PvP game.

name: Rika Furude Simulator '25
summary:
Return once again to the neverending June of 1983!

The world Rika Furude seeks still lies beyond a roll of six sixes on the die she must cast to determine her fate.

The highly-acclaimed fate defying simulator returns with this hotly anticipated incremental update that will have you clicking to roll the dice again and again, perhaps even for an eternity!

The future she seeks is just as far away as it's ever been, but with you at her side, Rika is sure to find the miracle she's been hoping for.

name: Rising Sun
summary: Immerse yourself in the anime atmosphere of Japanese streets! Test your skills on mountain passes and drag strips behind the wheel of iconic Japanese cars, and explore an open world where every race becomes a masterclass in drifting and speed.

name: Riftaway
summary: Riftaway is an NDS/N64-inspired 3D platformer in which you help a young witch recover her lost memories in an outter-space-like world known as... the Riftaway! Collect memory-refreshing crystals and meet unique personalities in a world where even gravity is broken.

name: Rivage
summary: Rivage is an immersive sci-fi puzzle adventure set aboard the A.R.E.S. space station trapped in a space phenomenon. Wake up as Miranda, forced to explore, solve intricate puzzles to unravel the fate of your missing crew.

name: Rift Fishing
summary: Rift Fishing is a multiplayer chatroom-focused fishing game. Fish through rifts into other worlds to catch mysterious creatures and artifacts. Make friends worldwide, paint together, and jam by the cozy campfire.

name: Rise & Dine
summary: Start with a hotdog stand and build your way up to a restaurant! Cook meals, manage food freshness, hire employees for your truck fleet, unlock new locations, serve increasingly demanding customers, and more!

name: R.I.P.
summary: A co-op horror game where you manipulate your own gravity to traverse a procedurally generated 3D maze filled with supernatural threats. Work alone or with your team to rescue kidnapped victims.

name: Riftwalker
summary: Riftwalker is a solo-developed, story-driven sci fi action RPG where every contract pulls you deeper into the void. Track fugitives across seven worlds and gain powers that erode your humanity.

name: Rivals of Aether: Pool Party Skin Pack
summary: A pack of Premium Pool Party Skins for characters Etalus, Kragg, Orcane, Pomme, and Ranno.

name: Rivals of Aether: Steampunk Skin Pack
summary: A pack of Premium Steampunk Skins for Absa, Orcane, Sylvanos, and Zetterburn, plus the Loxobot Buddy.

name: Rivals of Aether: Legacy Skin Pack
summary: A pack of Premium Skins including Shine Zetterburn, Tuxedo Ranno, High Roller Absa, Dreamscape Forsburn, and Collegiate Wrastor.

name: Rivals of Aether: Community Skin Pack
summary: A collection of various Community DLC including Excalibur Zetterburn, Grassroots League Orcane, the Tony Tailslide buddy, the Frostbear cub buddy, and the CEO Ring Stage Skin.

name: Rivals of Aether: Arcade Skin Pack
summary: A pack of Premium Arcade skins for Clairen, Mollo, Maypul, and Elliana, plus the Kraggling Buddy.

name: Rivals of Aether: Genesis Skin Pack
summary: A pack of Premium Genesis Skins for characters Clairen, Etalus, Forsburn, Hodan, Kragg, Sylvanos, and Zetterburn.

name: Rivals of Aether: Champion Skin Pack
summary: A huge bundle of Premium Champion Skins for characters Mollo, Clairen, Zetterburn, Forsburn, Pomme, Wrastor, Absa, Elliana, Olympia, Sylvanos, Maypul, Kragg, Hodan, Orcane, Etalus, and Ranno.

name: Rivals of Aether: Heat Wave Skin Pack
summary: A pack of Premium Heat Wave Skins for Clairen, Forsburn, Olympia, and Wrastor, plus the Sunbert Buddy.

name: Rivals of Aether: Summit Skin Pack
summary: A pack of Premium Summit Skins including Spangled Wrastor, Summit Orcane, Summit Kragg, Panda Maypul, and Panda Etalus.

name: Rings of Heaven
summary: A multiplayer roguelike action platformer with a focus on teamwork and cooperation. Play as angel vtuber Amai Lilia and friends and take on heaven's deadliest gauntlet, the Rings of Heaven.

name: Risky Mining
summary: Risky Mining is a solo Roll & Move board game blending luck and strategy. Roll the dice to move and build up your stats. When you feel you're ready, start mining to challenge the target score! Your judgment determines your score.

name: Ribbeat
summary: The first full game from American indie game developer Devalor, Ribbeat is the first twin stick game that focuses solely on rhythm gameplay. Snag countless flies and worms in this exhilarating frog-themed trial of dexterity and improve your skill through persistence.

name: Rivalia Online
summary: Rivalia Online is a classic-style fantasy MMORPG inspired by early Tibia gameplay, focused on slow progression, meaningful PvE and PvP, and a player-driven world. Explore dangerous lands, face challenging monsters and bosses, master professions, and forge your legacy in a harsh but rewarding online realm built for long-term adventure.

name: Rise of State
summary: Rise of State is a state management game focused on leadership and strategy. Every decision you make affects public happiness, military strength, the economy, and political stability. Manage crises, define your ideology, and try to keep your state standing.

name: Rise of the Cones: Planetary Defense
summary: Rise of the Cones is a 3D sci-fi tower defense game set on alien worlds. Build and upgrade towers to stop relentless cone-shaped machines before they reach your base.

name: RiftChess
summary: RiftChess is a chess-based strategy game, featuring a dynamic board where special square types appear at random locations. These squares can remove, teleport, or promote pieces, and their frequency increases over the course of the game.

name: Riddle Of Revenge
summary:
Riddle of Revenge is a conceptual gameplay mod for Doom, forged under the inspiration of other renowned mods, but with a thematic difference: it is heavily based on the "pseudo-conceptual horror story" of the album Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge.

It's art direction features pre-rendered animations created from scratch, running at 35 frames per second, giving the gameplay a deliberately unique aesthetic. To execute their sweet revenge, the player will have a vast arsenal of 11 weapons and other moves to be ready for battle.

name: Ribbits
summary: RIBBITS is voice-action cooperative platformer! Players control frogs that adjust their jump strength using the volume of their voices, and work together by connecting their tongues like ropes to overcome obstacles. Shout, cooperate, and team up with your friends to reach your goal!

name: Rise of the Successor
summary: You wake up as North Korea’s Supreme Leader. Manage diplomacy, internal power struggles, and national survival. Balance nuclear ambition, public needs, and elite loyalty. One wrong move could cost you everything — will you rule or fall?

name: Rise of Chi
summary: When Chi finds her eggs are stolen by sneaky snakes, she is forced to leave everything behind. A brave journey that begins with a personal mission and escalates into something far bigger. Guided by unlikely allies and haunted by self-doubt, Chi must face enemies far greater than she imagined.

name: River Runners
summary: River Runners is a cooperative multiplayer adventure where you and your friends navigate a dangerous, unpredictable river. Clear communication and teamwork are essential to steer the raft, overcome hidden challenges, and survive the journey to the end.

name: Rigby Saw Game
summary: The evil puppet has kidnapped Mordecai to force Rigby to play his evil game. Help him rescue Mordecai safe and sound!

name: Ridge Racer
summary: A port of Ridge Racer, originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Rise of Mutant Swarms
summary: Rise of Mutant Swarms is a strategy survival tower-defense game where you defend the base against waves of evolving mutant enemies. Place and upgrade turrets, adapt to enemy abilities, and make critical decisions as the pressure rises with every wave.

name: Rick's Konbini
summary: 5 days until the apocalypse... and you finally got a j*b!! The chronically ill rabbit "Rick" Was given an ultimatum by his roommate to get a j*b or get out!! So he puts on his "best" smelling suit and gets to work!

name: Rite of Red Snow
summary: A 3D puzzle platformer set in the stone age. You explore a beautiful stone age world, solve relaxing puzzles, experience an exciting narrative and fend off adversaries in a unique directional combat system. In the end, only you decide what kind of person you are and if you fulfill your duty...
